class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/150604-code2048.html#fw-code-2048\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<ul> \n <li>来自 <a href=\"https://code2048.com/topic/3/code-2048-%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E5%8D%8F%E8%AE%AE?from=timeline&amp;isappinstalled=0\">Code 2048 用户使用协议 | Code&nbsp;2048</a></li> \n</ul> \n<p>一般用户协议（所谓<span class=\"caps\">TOS</span>）是一份专业到看不懂的法律文件，但那没意义。这里没有复杂到看不懂的东西，只是一些简单的规则。</p> \n<ul> \n <li>这是扩展自《神秘的程序员们》系列漫画的讨论区。主要话题包括程序员漫画相关讨论、所有技术相关话题及互联网、创业、项目管理、设计、产品、职业和职场、科幻、游戏话题。</li> \n <li>在这些话题之外的内容，可能会不受欢迎，或被移出主要讨论区甚至直接删除，并且有可能导致相关帐号被封。</li> \n <li>保持礼貌，禁止人身攻击/种族/地域/宗教/职业歧视之类令人不快的内容。</li> \n <li>禁止发布违法内容。违法的定义：目前本站位于美国加州，请遵守美国互联网相关法律法规。包括但不限于“<span class=\"caps\">COPPA</span>“、“<span class=\"caps\">DMCA</span>”等。服务器所在国家的变化会导致“违法”定义发生变化，但变化之前会在主要讨论区明显位置通知即将发生的改动。</li> \n <li>禁止一切干扰用户正常阅读的行为，包括但不限于利用系统Bug发布破坏格式，大量重复内容，对用户浏览器造成伤害等行为。</li> \n <li>所有禁止类内容会被直接删除，并且有可能导致相关帐号被封。</li> \n <li>请使用投票功能（每个主题的右上角的箭头图标）来表达支持和反对，不用简单回帖”顶“、”支持”，本站设置最少发帖内容长度是8个字。</li> \n <li>考虑微信登录等需要已备案网站，未来本站存在转移到中国大陆的可能性，转移之前会在主要讨论区明显位置另行通知。这种情况发生时，可能会导致本站部分内容被删除。</li> \n <li>欢迎转贴你喜欢的，符合本站主要讨论话题的内容。任何转贴必须保留原始链接和原始作者，如果可以取得原著作权人授权，可以转贴全文以方便阅读。在不能取得授权的情况下，只允许转贴链接供讨论。位于访问困难或可能消失的网站内容，允许做为特殊例外情况直接转贴全文，但如果著作权持有人要求删除，本站会立即删除相关内容，只保留链接。</li> \n <li>禁止用发帖的方式发布一切”硬广告”。但如果专门为本站用户制作的广告，让本站用户感觉有趣，精彩，愉悦或者赠予本站用户特殊权利、利益，并且因此得到本站用户欢迎，就会被当作正常发布的内容允许存在。</li> \n <li>和大多数网站不同，本站不要求获得用户创造内容的”非独占性、全球性、永久性、不可撤回”的权利。在本站，用户创造内容的全部权利仍然属于用户本人，发表于本站只意味着用户授权本站发表。用户随时有权利删除，撤回，修改自己发布过的内容。不过考虑到内容的历史意义和讨论价值，本站希望在正常情况下，用户发表之后的内容尽量不要被大量修改或删除。</li> \n <li>本站内容禁止其他任何媒体、网站通过数字及非数字形式转载，除非获得作者直接授权。如果用户提出协助要求，本站愿意尽一起努力帮助用户维护著作权。</li> \n <li>本协议随时有可能修改，但任何修改都会在主要讨论区明显位置给予提示。如果用户不同意修改，可以停止使用本站服务并且删除自己的帐号和发表过的内容。否则视为同意协议内容。</li> \n</ul> \n<h2 id=\"_1\">是也乎,(￣▽￣)<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/150604-code2048.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>很明显, 2048 以及西乔,并不是想作中国的 <span class=\"caps\">XKCD</span> ,&nbsp;而是想走出自个儿的话题文化来.</p> \n<p>支持,以及坚持吐糟,吐有品质的糟!</p>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 04 Jun 2015 11:42:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"c68ed59b87fb36650e148741fad16600","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"ZoomQuiet","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148760},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"S04E15/ 无之诗篇23","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170214-S04E15-poem23.html","description":"<h1 id=\"s04e15-23\"><span class=\"caps\">S04E15</span>: 无之诗篇23<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170214-S04E15-poem23.html#s04e15-23\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<ul> \n <li>累积:&nbsp;11+年</li> \n <li>酝酿: 2天,&nbsp;决定继续剧本大纲</li> \n <li>初稿: 1.5h&nbsp;3500+字</li> \n <li>再稿: 1h&nbsp;2700+字</li> \n <li>三稿: .5h&nbsp;2200+字</li> \n</ul> \n<h2 id=\"_1\">荣归圣零<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170214-S04E15-poem23.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>&lt;冥王星面向地球一方,赤道中央,巨大金字塔顶部平台&gt;</p> \n<p>滴滴哒的高频数据传送声和嘶嘶的暗哑吼声混杂在一起,</p> \n<p>(就象异形身体各处嵌入终结者零件那样) 异生物根据所披法袍颜色有规律的阵列四方, 围住中央圆形祭台, 上躺一头身形明显大一倍的机体,&nbsp;台站着同样身量,着绿色法袍的祭师:</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>以无上圣零为名, <span class=\"caps\">RAMEN</span>” “<span class=\"caps\">RAMEN</span>…”在场异形轰然而应, 瞬间在所有频道中掀起了一次数据呼啸;&nbsp;引动”卫圣阵”中近70亿异形,同时关注这次荣归仪式,</p> \n<p>(卫圣阵 由近乎均匀分布的几百万颗大小武装卫星组成, 在冥王星轨道内外42光秒范畴内, 将整个儿太阳系严密包绕起来,&nbsp;扼止一切飞向地球的企图.)</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>GC4z001 是计划发起26贤者之一, 已忠诚服务了420年,今天, 选择了荣归,&nbsp;现在,最后问一次:汝!自愿荣归圣灵否?”</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>是的,</p> \n<p>恩惠慈爱 永归圣殿&nbsp;直至永远!”</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>如所愿! <span class=\"caps\">RAMEN</span>!”</p> \n<p>祭师抬起左前第一臂,狠狠戳入 GC4z001 第四右眼,将电子眼挖了出来高高举起, 然后用右前第3臂,按了一下祭台边缘, 光幕爆起, GC4z001 瞬间粉碎成闪光的微尘,&nbsp;喷向无尽的虚空…</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span><span class=\"caps\">RAMEN</span>!” … 现场所有祭士轰应声还没有散去;&nbsp;公共频道就响起了警告:</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>Alert, Alert, 第1和第6象限同时有宇航器接近! 乾,震二部,&nbsp;圣卫出击!”</p> \n<h2 id=\"_2\">献祭圣路<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170214-S04E15-poem23.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>验证我!”, “验证我!”… 随着一声声怒吼,一队队大汉, 一刀砍下自己右脚第四趾, 郑重排在点将台前的战旗下, 拿战术医疗融胶一封伤口, 穿上宇航服, 跳入亚当37型突击舰中. 由电磁加速通道, 从大致呈长方体的宇航母舰周身抛射而出,&nbsp;冲向武装卫星发射出来的漫天空间机雷…</p> \n<p>后方远处的指挥舰, 是从一颗资源慧星上直接建筑出来的,&nbsp;所以,腰部还有未采集完的部分星体露出.</p> \n<p>指挥官和参谋团沉默的立在大屏幕前,&nbsp;都是满头银发的老头,</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>Tom,&nbsp;这是最后一批满编的突击集团了…”</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>已经反复攻击5年多,&nbsp;资源星也已经采集光了”</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>是的,已经到极限了” 为首,身穿墨绿嵌金边上将服的老人转身面向弟兄们: “但是,我不甘心!” “母星就在前方, 偏偏就是过不去!” 老人神情一肃: “我命令: 48小时后,发起全员突击, 突破战列线,采集到母星的最新信息!” 沉默了一会儿: “…然后, 第一时间,发射通讯仓,&nbsp;汇报一切!”“</p> \n<h2 id=\"_3\">魂返圣方<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170214-S04E15-poem23.html#_3\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>同时,另一个象限, 一组纤细优美,形若如意的飞船,&nbsp;没有发射任何武器,只是迎着铁灰色的武装卫星慢慢前进….</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>姬叶-336, 不再尝试其它沟通方式了? 也不联合其它分支文明了?” 驾驶中心,所有操控士,都是女生, 站在舰桥上的正副舰长,穿着和其它船员一样的紧身服,&nbsp;只是颜色为明黄色,身侧为黑色3细边.</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>姬玉-1024, 早就证明对方不愿沟通的,&nbsp;而那些包含Y形变异体的文明,是不可能理解我们的理解!”</p> \n<p>姬叶-336,&nbsp;拔动一下开关,对全体舰队进行通话:</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>姐妹们, 我们的文明,自洽和美, 原不必和始源星沟通的, 但是,盖亚引导着我们, 必须将我们的安乐分享回始源, ” 神情一整: “在经过42年的亚空间航行后,&nbsp;此刻,即是圣魂归还时!”</p> \n<p>此时,警告灯正好闪起来 —&nbsp;漫天机雷,在警告未果后,一起扑过来,</p> \n<p>明灭的红色警戒灯光中, 所有人,安详喜乐的闭上眼,&nbsp;同时左手紧紧握住自己右手第四指:</p> \n<p>心中一起默诵起那一诗篇…</p> \n<h2 id=\"_4\">种植文明<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170214-S04E15-poem23.html#_4\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>未知的遥远未来,发现了一种高效传播人类文明的方式:</p> \n<p>通过向宇宙四方高密度发射亚光速”种子舱”</p> \n<ul> \n <li>只有mini cooper&nbsp;大小,含超级电脑/受精卵库/以及海量纳米机器人</li> \n <li>勘察到吻合一定条件的星球,并降落后</li> \n <li>先放出纳米机器人,一边勘探资源,一边就地自我殖增</li> \n <li>先基地,并复活部分动植物,形成微型地球圈</li> \n <li>然后通过人工子宫,诞生一对男女婴儿</li> \n <li>通过机器人养育,成年后接管整个基地的控制</li> \n <li>女的将自称夏娃,开始养育批量诞生的婴孩</li> \n <li>男的自称亚当,管理所有工程机器人,进行大建设</li> \n <li>因夏娃和亚当,必须在不完备的地球圈套中生活,&nbsp;为避免发生意外疾病并遗传下去,所以,调制为不可生育,</li> \n <li>后果是生命将额外悠长,一般可以活到400岁</li> \n <li>足以陪护20代新人类,达到 10&nbsp;万这个最小族群数量</li> \n <li>这样,顺利的话, 不用500年,&nbsp;就能在一个星系立足</li> \n <li>并有足够的资源,&nbsp;可以向地球发送消息,完成人类的一次跃迁式移民.</li> \n</ul> \n<p>但是,各种意外,也接连发生, 有的只有亚当成活,有的相反, 更有一粒”种子舱”遭受意外猛烈宇宙风暴后, 只有极少数生物还保有活性, 同时主电脑也意外转生出了自我意识,&nbsp;下了一个计划外的决定:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>和剩余的残缺地球生物融合,以便能保有地球记忆</li> \n <li>以此为发端,&nbsp;高速进化出异形文明</li> \n</ul> \n<p>由于整体意识可无缝沟通,且身体半机械化强度提高,&nbsp;对生存环境的要求大大降低,在所有其它文明回归前,高速回访到地球.</p> \n<blockquote> \n <p>却发现,人类早已灭亡;</p> \n</blockquote> \n<p>遗留物中,发现 <strong>“文明种植”</strong>&nbsp;计划最后指令:</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>不要回来,你们自由了”</p> \n<p>异形文明基于此指令决策:</p> \n<blockquote> \n <p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>阻止其它分支文明知道母星灭亡!”</p> \n</blockquote> \n<p>于焉….</p> \n<blockquote> \n <p>注: 故事创意来自: 飞腾科幻军团/冯志刚: 发表于《大众软件》的&nbsp;“种植文明”</p> \n</blockquote>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 14 Feb 2017 12:42:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"fe7c025e527d9bade31f08865a03823f","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"ZoomQuiet","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148759},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"OSS good for enterprise","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/oss-good-4-china-com.html","description":"<h1 id=\"oss\">企业进行<span class=\"caps\">OSS</span>的好处<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/oss-good-4-china-com.html#oss\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<p><code>~中国绝大多数IT企业</code></p> \n<p><img alt=\"oss\" src=\"https://d262ilb51hltx0.cloudfront.net/max/700/1*2m0OBPBnBJu0WrobbfnBkg.png\" /></p> \n<p>其实也是欠稿一篇, 先是忽悠朋友完成了作文: <a href=\"http://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/zhuangbiaowei/19576637\">企业开源杂谈 — 思考<span class=\"caps\">IT</span> — 知乎专栏</a></p> \n<p>然后,又引发了系列讨论,结果变成了自个儿应该还的一篇文章,,,&nbsp;同样的,由大脑自动后台组稿42天,快速输出一版本先:</p> \n<h2 id=\"_1\">背景:<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/oss-good-4-china-com.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>首先, 俺自个儿, 社区称号:大妈, 入行以来加入N 多技术社区, 长年混杂在各种企业内外社区中,折腾,再折腾,从来没有什么成型的<span class=\"caps\">NB</span>的流传于世或是企业生产系统中的项目… 按照 Eric&nbsp;Raymond的著名文章:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">如何成为一名黒客</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>其中的定义,俺属于绝对意义上的大妈式 Hacker, 公布有效信息(文档/翻译)/维护维基/传播Hack&nbsp;文化本身… </p> \n<p>然后,从业14年,从前台作到后台,作不动现代的全端工程师,掺合过的公司从4人到4000人的级别都有;近年,基本作 开发者关系管理(<span class=\"caps\">DRM</span>), <span class=\"caps\">KPI</span> 计算&nbsp;40%开发,其它是社区活动的组织/筹备/主持/演讲/宣传/推广… </p> \n<h2 id=\"_2\">范畴<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/oss-good-4-china-com.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>一篇文章绝对不可能将一个领域的发展问题分析明白的,所以,为了表述的健康/合理,&nbsp;先定一下讨论的范畴,以免各种扩大化式的乱入.</p> \n<ul> \n <li>只说<span class=\"caps\">IT</span>企业,即,主赢收业务是软件/互联网/移动/服务…&nbsp;etc.</li> \n <li>中国企业,无论注册地/资本来由/管理层国藉,&nbsp;只论主要业务在中国大陆,主要开发者是中国本土码农… </li> \n <li>开源,就是标准的 <span class=\"caps\">FLOSS</span> ~ 使用标准的许可证以及发布形式/维护过程 的 自由/开源软件, 因为开放源代码,对于&nbsp;自由软件还是开源软件都是基本要求,只是后续发布的要求有差别,早已被中国媒体给搅合的说不清楚了,所以,一概论之了… </li> \n <li>因为职业原因,不便对老雇主或是现雇主泄漏什么内部机密,所以,只讨论,如同化学实验,嗯嗯嗯,,,精确的说,就象写 SiFi 小说一样推演,企业推行 <span class=\"caps\">OSS</span> 的好处; 试图达到度目标就是能向一般的<span class=\"caps\">BOSS</span>/同事,以极其常识的叙述来说明白,为什么应该 <span class=\"caps\">OSS</span>,&nbsp;至于坏处,就当没有吧,反正在中国没有什么正当的追究过程… </li> \n</ul> \n<h2 id=\"_3\">故事<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/oss-good-4-china-com.html#_3\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<ol> \n <li>从前有个公司,使用了开源软件,后来,嗯嗯嗯,就没有后来了!</li> \n <li>从前又一公司,开源了内部系统,然后,嗯嗯嗯,就没有然后了!</li> \n <li>从前还是一公司,从一开始就用开源软件的形式来专发,嗯嗯嗯,然后也没有然后了… </li> \n</ol> \n<h2 id=\"_4\">断语<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/oss-good-4-china-com.html#_4\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>嗯嗯嗯,共同之处就素:所有公司都玩一朝天子一朝臣,后人废掉前尘事儿! 大家都实在太习惯太顺畅太自说自话太自发自觉的作这类事儿了… .其实,追点儿根儿,很简单,无论多重要,多<span class=\"caps\">NB</span> 的代码,在公司中除了写那些代码的人,其余根本没有人能够/愿意/喜欢&nbsp;真正理解这些要命的代码,而且最后竟然,就连代码原作者也都认同了这种”文化”随时抛弃无论当初花多少精力折腾出来的代码了… </p> \n<p>所以,企业真正进行开源工程式的产品开发,目测至少有这么几个方面是立即可以获得好处的:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>产品安全性立即获得极大的提高,因为所有人知道,代码都特么开源了,服务想安全,就得作到运行时,真正安全了!</li> \n <li>代码将真正为越来越多的人理解,从而所有工程师的工作将无法简单的通过行政命令抹杀,随着开源项目的不断扩散/衍生/复用,原作者的价值在不断增值!</li> \n <li>文档将被自主自发的不断完善,因为一个没有好文档的项目,本身再<span class=\"caps\">NB</span> 也没人用! 测试将被自主自发的由开发者自个儿进行了,因为开源后,有太多自动化测试服务可以在外网自在的使用了,再也不用跟测试部的那帮<span class=\"caps\">XX</span>叽歪了!</li> \n <li>开发人员的工作时间立即被自主自发的延长了! 因为开源工程受到关注后,全球用户可不管你们是否下班了,那 Issue&nbsp;是随时捅过来的!</li> \n <li>项目维护人员免费增加了! 只要项目真正解决领域问题,那么公司自个儿都没有用到的场景也一定会有人用上,根据开源协议,人家也必须将修订提交回来… 好了,免费的比自家公司还<span class=\"caps\">NB</span>&nbsp;的工程师为咱开始工作了!</li> \n <li>技术团队的业界形象立即加持圣光了! 以后招人,也就不用送<span class=\"caps\">MM</span> 之类的下作手法了,只说来了能同 <span class=\"caps\">XX</span>项目的原创程序员一起工作!</li> \n</ol> \n<p>等等吧…&nbsp;就不逐一推导了… </p> \n<h1 id=\"_5\">但是!<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/oss-good-4-china-com.html#_5\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<p>以上的一切好处获得的前题是:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">进行真正的开源项目运行</span>\n<span class=\"err\">坚持以纯粹的开源社区形式运营</span>\n<span class=\"err\">公司的真实业务系统真正使用开源项目的代码</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>以及,其实隐藏在这三项基本坚持之下引发的各种 <code>管理/组织/绩效/人力</code> 等等的配套支撑.</p> \n<p>所以, 只能是SiFi 式的推导了… 因为中国<span class=\"caps\">IT</span> 企业天生的同开源社区式开发有内在的抵触…&nbsp;具体的,大家都懂的,不用俺费劲分析了卟?!</p> \n<h2 id=\"_6\">所以<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/oss-good-4-china-com.html#_6\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>友人收作业后反馈,肿么没有后续了?&nbsp;比如遭遇各种反驳,如何进一步攻防之类… </p> \n<p><code>图样儿图森破!</code></p> \n<p>在公司里,不遭受质疑那是不可能的!</p> \n<p>但是,有质疑就进行反驳…&nbsp;你以为你是方舟子对韩寒哪!</p> \n<p>企业进行开源,无非两种推行模式: <code>嬴政式</code>/<code>吴广式</code></p> \n<ul> \n <li>前者,<span class=\"caps\">BOSS</span> 就是开源出身,先信了,强行推之,整个公司所有部门为之配合,反正败了<span class=\"caps\">BOSS</span> 自个儿负责,然后,慢慢品出了好处,于是更加大力在实践中学习再学习,在学习中感动再感动… 慢慢的,公司如果不死,那就真正形成文化传承下去了,否则就变成业界又一<span class=\"caps\">SB</span>&nbsp;传说… </li> \n <li>后者,习惯了开源开发方式了,瞒着公司,将自个儿一亩三分田先折腾起来,慢慢的,慢慢的对比其它同类团队的同类系统,肿么这么出名呢? 靠! 原来这丫开源了!&nbsp;然后,没有然后了,不是被掐掉,就是这团队解散了… </li> \n</ul> \n<p>所以? 这些好处,多数情况,要不根本无从质疑 (<span class=\"caps\">BOSS</span>稀饭!-) ,&nbsp;要不根本轮不到质疑,也就没有什么反击之说了… </p> \n<p>其实!&nbsp;公司里的质疑,根本没有质疑的任何意思在里面,无非是责任推卸:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"s\">\"我早就质疑过的哟,只是这丫不听,所以,没俺一毛钱关系!\"</span>\n<span class=\"s\">\"看吧! 要不是早先我质疑过,他们才改进,现在肿么可能成功?!\"</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>所以?&nbsp;有质疑时,只要你勇敢的担当下来,没人有空跟你分析什么协议的… </p> \n<p>所以! 在企业里推进<span class=\"caps\">OSS</span>,&nbsp;最最最低程度,你得是个有足够话语权的强力团队头目,或领域技术带头人… </p> \n<p>不过,一般在这种地位上,都要担营收的<span class=\"caps\">KPI</span>, 需要接销售各种奇葩的单子,哪儿有空搞 <span class=\"caps\">OSS</span>&nbsp;运动哪… </p> \n<p>所以,俺反复说了是 <code>SiFi</code> 式的推理呢… </p> \n<h2 id=\"changelog\">Changelog<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/oss-good-4-china-com.html#changelog\" title=\"Permanent O.</span>—&nbsp;Medium</a></li> \n</ul>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 10 Nov 2013 16:00:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"https://d262ilb51hltx0.cloudfront.net/max/700/1*2m0OBPBnBJu0WrobbfnBkg.png","linkMd5":"e1ce63f3e4d320a108bf407899b2f132","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn7@2020_6/2020/08/24/14-59-17-648_3d8e1924ab0bd012.webp","destWidth":700,"destHeight":678,"sourceBytes":120780,"destBytes":40014,"author":"Zoom.Quiet","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://d262ilb51hltx0.cloudfront.net/max/700/1*2m0OBPBnBJu0WrobbfnBkg.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn7@2020_6/2020/08/24/14-59-17-648_3d8e1924ab0bd012.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148767},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 class=\"caps\">GC4S14E51</span>🐙 真实的如同假装<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170512-GC4S14E51true4frake.html#gc4s14e51\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<p>十年修得同船渡</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">百年修得共枕眠</span>\n<span class=\"err\">千年修得亲囡囡</span>\n<span class=\"err\">万般还得前世债</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<h2 id=\"_1\">学区房<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170512-GC4S14E51true4frake.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>四年前初夏闷热的傍晚, 在徐汇这个楼盘, 小郭已经站了至少200天, 却没卖出去一套, 要不是还在兼职早饿死了. 虽然地处上海核心区, 又是 世外/盛大/逸夫/爱菊 四大私立中学所在学区, 理论上只要有楼放盘, 都应疯抢的, 问题在, 这楼是30年代的, 而且无产权,仅售使用权, 精明的上海人, 买楼都是用来投资的, 这种升值有限的,&nbsp;自然无人问津.</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>咦, 这位上周来拿过资料, 只是, 开的车才20几万, 将军肚尺寸一般, 不象小开,&nbsp;买的起嘛?”</p> \n<p>小郭还是很职业的迎了上去; “先生…” “上次说的那套房还在吧?” “呃, 在的, 当然在的.” “好!” 从身后拽出个 <span class=\"caps\">LINING</span> 32升中桶包, 往桌上一放: “这是370万现金, 我们希望尽快入住.” “哗…真港都…”&nbsp;周围的同事都看傻了.</p> \n<p>是的, 我们的主角不是小郭, 是决然举债提前6年,&nbsp;为女儿抢下学区房的小七.</p> \n<h2 id=\"_2\">普通人<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170512-GC4S14E51true4frake.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>小七在组里时不时抛出些断言,比如:&nbsp;“我本质上就是个臭流氓”</p> \n<p>然后就消失在各地的酒桌上, 神奇的是, 隔天清醒爬回来, 总能赶上大家的进度, 文稿照交,和合照怼,&nbsp;啥也不缺席.</p> \n<p>作为组里唯二的两位男学员, 又都成家, 相对无趣很多, 所以, 为了减轻其它同组的压力, 主动认领了小七, 原准备用练习了37年的春秋笔法,&nbsp;虚构出位鲜明的沪上成功人士.</p> \n<p>但是, 42分钟远程语音采访下来, 发现普通到一定程度,&nbsp;其实也足够传奇了.</p> \n<p>小七和那个时代很大一批同龄人一样, 祖藉北上广一线大城市, 但随着父辈响应国家号召, 随着知青政策,&nbsp;在祖国边疆落了草.</p> \n<p>小七高中前, 生长在新疆, 骑马,杀羊,怼过狼, 也联合小伙伴抢过女朋友们. 原以为能在瀚海上驰骋一生. 没想到命运将他抛回没有翻散/手抓/烤馕/…&nbsp;的故乡.</p> \n<p>小七和其它从 边疆 回归子弟一样, 拼力自我改造多年, 才洗掉羊膻味儿, 重新变回上海人, 但是, 流利的上海话, 时髦的外表,并没有改变内在奔放的 边疆&nbsp;心胸.</p> \n<p>小七出色的酒量, 以及待人接物的豪爽, 有力的支撑他稳步在销售岗位持续升迁, 积累的渠道/经验, 推动他开始向富贵人生挺进时, 女儿的到来, 将童年那些美丽的倩影,&nbsp;逐一复活在眼前,</p> \n<p>小七被自己顿悟了: 负责5000万, 8000万, 或是 2亿销售额又怎样? 即使能轻松作到又怎样? 销售本身并不创造什么新的价值, 事业再成功,&nbsp;没有传承,没有创造的人生本质是零.</p> \n<p>正如他在作业中描述的那个瞬间:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">扭头</span> <span class=\"err\">微风中</span> <span class=\"err\">女儿追逐着肥皂泡</span>\n<span class=\"err\">身影稚嫩</span> <span class=\"err\">分外可人</span>\n<span class=\"err\">自己却只能气喘的滩在远处看着</span><span class=\"p\">.</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>看清自己正在逐渐虚无的状态,&nbsp;小七决定必须以身作责:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">教会女儿</span> <span class=\"err\">良好的锻炼</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"err\">阅读</span> <span class=\"err\">习惯</span><span class=\"p\">,</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>这才有可能和家人一起五福圆满.</p> \n<p>儿时, 在边疆高远的天地间熏陶出来的豪气, 摧动小七, 借贷两百多万,&nbsp;抢下沪上最核心的学区房;</p> \n<p>也推动着他从零开始重新奔跑; 不到五年, 完成全马, 并自费参加专业教练班,&nbsp;可以成体系的给家人朋友同事们分享运动技能;</p> \n<p>也推动着他挤出时间参与 好中文 写作班, 有意识的逼自己在学员们的压力中,&nbsp;持续练习写作,</p> \n<p>以便创造性的记述自己的思考, 为女儿, 未来延续不绝的家族,&nbsp;留下有意义的记忆.</p> \n<h2 id=\"_3\">未来<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170512-GC4S14E51true4frake.html#_3\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>未来, 未来的就是没有到来的未来,&nbsp;未来的一切,都是当下自己所有作为的延伸和累积.</p> \n<p>小七的过去, 被他自己正视并珍视, 在不惑的门口, 小七完成了人生观的升级, 调整了内观的重心, 更加从容的认真活在当下, 不报怨, 不责难, 接受应许, 感念所得, 虽说采访中,反复在念叨各种佛教概念, 听起来好象又一位民间仁波切, 但是, 真的要能一直假装到底,&nbsp;那和真正的了悟有何区别?</p> \n<p>开悟即通达,祝一直普通的小七,&nbsp;可以坚守这普遍的幸福到百年后.</p>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 12 May 2017 12:42:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"da19f2aacc737127b443cfc8b3f15b11","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"ZoomQuiet","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148756},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"S12E01/23世纪 学校","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170418-S12E01-23cc.html","description":"<h1 id=\"s12e0123\"><span class=\"caps\">S12E01</span>:23世纪:学校<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170418-S12E01-23cc.html#s12e0123\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<h2 id=\"_1\">无意蓄水 垒世界<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170418-S12E01-23cc.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>大学前, 一直生活在兰州某处军工企业的福利区; 小学前, 就开始挖掘职工图书馆了; 三年级前, 所有能找到的凡尔纳小说都看过至少一遍; 非常敬仰 “神密岛” 中那位无所不能的工程师, 仅用随身携带的极少工业制品, 就能在荒岛上逐渐再制出现代化生活. 也从中知道了一种神奇的职业:&nbsp;博物学家.</p> \n<p>学校教育当然是无法满足博物学家自我成长的, 即便是山寨版本的, 无意间,&nbsp;启动了原始的私人知识库筑造:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>订阅各种科学相关报刊</li> \n <li>计有:</li> \n <li>奥秘</li> \n <li>少年科学</li> \n <li>科学画报</li> \n <li>国际航空</li> \n <li>航空知识</li> \n <li>兵器知识</li> \n <li>世界军事</li> \n <li>…</li> \n <li>然后:</li> \n <li>有感兴趣的,折页</li> \n <li>分门别类装档案袋</li> \n <li>另外找硬皮本,&nbsp;手工索引知识点:杂志期数/页数</li> \n</ul> \n<p>但随着积累的持续, 发现自己想出来的各种索引方法都不好用, 进一步的, 明确课堂上教的, 和实际期待的相差太远; 但是, 自己的思维/谈吐/写作等等, 并没有什么不正常的, 那么,&nbsp;一定是这个世界有问题.</p> \n<h2 id=\"_2\">中学作文 溃高考<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170418-S12E01-23cc.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>初三某次语文课, 作业要求是不限内容的小说; 猛然间, 意识到这是集中阐述自己教育观的最方便渠道. 于是,用了三个星期,&nbsp;写成3万字的科幻小说:</p> \n<p>23世纪:学校</p> \n<p>描述因为被意外冷冻, 从而完成了时光旅行的自己, 在300年后学校中的见闻,&nbsp;借其人物的言行来回答:</p> \n<p>什么是真正的教育</p> \n<p>这个一直在思考的问题.</p> \n<p>老师很无奈的给了98分, 但并没有在班级上推荐, 因为, 迟交了整整两星期. 其实, 还有更多想讨论的,&nbsp;没来得及写进去.</p> \n<p>2年后, 通过 “童话大王” 的一个小栏目, 关注到有篇微型小说, 作者是烟台小学生, 感觉世界观非常接近, 想办法达成了笔友. 通信往来中, 有次涉及教育,&nbsp;又被激发出冲动;</p> \n<p>这次, 用两个月, 将原先的作文,扩写为15万字, 用一个月誊抄,&nbsp;然后自己想办法装订:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>先烧红粗针</li> \n <li>烫出一组孔</li> \n <li>用细麻绳穿过,系好</li> \n <li>再蒙上牛皮纸</li> \n <li>变成稿纸组成的自出版图书</li> \n</ul> \n<p>邮寄费都要了5元.</p> \n<p>没想到竟然被邮局弄丢了.</p> \n<p>没办法, 再次誊抄, 没忍住, 同时进一步扩充到20万字, 还配了几幅插图, 这次, 只能装订为两本, 并用挂号信邮寄. 终于送达,&nbsp;心愿完成.</p> \n<p>高考也就到来了, 果然考砸, 虽然用写小说练出的语感, 帮助语文考试作文拿到高分, 但, 我是考理科的,&nbsp;其它科目并不理想.</p> \n<h2 id=\"_3\">块垒丛生 待去留<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170418-S12E01-23cc.html#_3\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>最终分数, 只能上专科, 虽然也有专升本的后期操作, 却不甘心, 于是重读一年, 重温应试题海教育的一应细节, 那天, 一拿到录取通知书, 冷静的将两次高考的所有模拟卷子扛出去, 认真的放了一把火,&nbsp;用半小时才烧光近一人高的试卷堆,</p> \n<p>是的, 这个世界一定哪里有不对, 这种学习,这般教育, 除了练出老僧般枯树之心外,&nbsp;全然获得不到什么有用的新能力.</p> \n<p>一毕业, 紧接着就业, 城市转战, 结婚, 生娃, 再被创业… 经历各种团队,项目,公司文化, 没有一刻停止, 求生存, 求机会, 求发展, 同时又不自主的持续组建/管理/参加不同的技术社区, 对教育的体验和理解也越加偏激, 有更多的块垒在胸中顽固生长着, 逼着心海的水位越来越高, 准备着, 时刻准备着,&nbsp;另一个契机能开闸喷薄而出.</p> \n<h2 id=\"_4\">嗯哼<a class=\"headerlink\" 下课铃一响,&nbsp;学生汹涌的冲出学校各自回家</li> \n <li>1215 食堂, 先回家拿到饭盒/饭票, 到食堂排队先买菜, 再打二两饭, 堆在一起, 快速吃完,&nbsp;洗好</li> \n <li>1242 午睡时间, 不过今天拿了球拍先去学校占个水泥台, 和同学玩起了双打&nbsp;,今天尝试横握</li> \n <li>1400 上课, 物理课首次实验, 光学,&nbsp;同学们玩的很开心</li> \n <li>1800 放学, 轮到作值日,&nbsp;负责拖地…</li> \n <li>1900 晚饭, 伴着隋唐演义评书认真吃饭,&nbsp;三菜一汤,有肉丝</li> \n <li>1930 外出回来,&nbsp;天已经黑了</li> \n <li>2200 睡觉, 之前完成了作业, 就一直在看书, 世界五千年,&nbsp;刚刚买的</li> \n  <ul> \n   <li>漫画家,&nbsp;画出中国自己的传奇故事</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>最快乐是何时? \n  <ul> \n   <li>大人不在家,&nbsp;可以一直看变形金刚</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ul> \n<h2 id=\"21-up\">21 <span class=\"caps\">UP</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/190712-GC4-S03E23-42UP.html#21-up\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<blockquote> \n <p>地点: 常州,&nbsp;江苏石油化工学院</p> \n</blockquote> \n<ul> \n -&nbsp;简书</a></p> \n  <p>对比第一期的野望:<a href=\"http://www.jianshu.com/p/b8908240cdbb\">我发起了《好中文的样子：36堂写作练习》 -&nbsp;简书</a></p> \n  <p>可以感受的到,&nbsp;从根本上不同与:</p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>文科专业的学术向研究</li> \n   <li>或是广告/文案/公号等专项领域的专用写作技巧传授</li> \n  </ul> \n  <p>这门课本质上…</p> \n  <h2 id=\"_2\">起初<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/171109-GC4-feeling.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n  <p>其实,&nbsp;小学时对写作是很有自信的:</p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>曾经用一天完成了暑假40天日记的伪装</li> \n   <li>家长和老师都没看出来</li> \n   <li>可以说,&nbsp;非虚构写作技能在小学三年级前已算过关</li> \n  </ul> \n  <p>进一步的:</p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>在初3,&nbsp;对一次语文作业进行了深度折腾</li> \n   <li>首稿提交的是3万字短篇小说</li> \n   <li>后来扩写为30万字</li> \n   <li>可以说,&nbsp;长篇故事的虚构写作也算过关的</li> \n  </ul> \n  <p>当然:</p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>最自得的是各种应用文创作</li> \n   <li>检讨书/检讨信/道歉书/道歉信/…</li> \n   <li>各种在公众场合对自己的灵魂进行真诚剖析并展示悔恨的文体</li> \n   <li>异常熟练,并形成了自己的套路</li> \n   <li>以致, 30多年后, 都能信手掂来:<a href=\"http://www.jianshu.com/p/6c3fcf5f8c6b\">有关门牙的公开检讨书</a></li> \n  </ul> \n  <h2 id=\"_3\">然后<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/171109-GC4-feeling.html#_3\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n  <p>进入大学之后,&nbsp;发觉根本没那么简单…</p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>无论邮件/报告/论文/说明/…</li> \n   <li>所有涉及文字的输出</li> \n   <li>大家第一反应,都是看不懂</li> \n   <li>唉唉?&nbsp;剧情不是这么设定的哪…</li> \n  </ul> \n  <p>所以,&nbsp;开始在人前沉默:</p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>好在,&nbsp;工作是软件工程师</li> \n   <li>只要电脑可以理解并正确执行出结果就好</li> \n   <li>对于那些当面和真实肉体实时交流的语言</li> \n   <li>和文书上的规则又是不同的宇宙规则了,&nbsp;先不讨论</li> \n  </ul> \n  <h2 id=\"_4\">所以<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/171109-GC4-feeling.html#_4\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n  <p>工作上了年头, 文案工作是少不了的,&nbsp;也就越来越急切的想整明白:</p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>技术社区中流通的文字和日常竟有什么不同?</li> \n   <li>为什么写的邮件同事们都说看不懂?</li> \n   <li>为什么中文图书越来越难以阅读?</li> \n   <li>为什么?…</li> \n  </ul> \n  <p>因为内心其实还未通达, 所以, 偶然间撞到 <strong><a href=\"http://h5.xiaoeknow.com/content_page/eyJ0eXBlIjozLCJyZXNvdXJjZV90eXBlIjoiIiwicmVzb3VyY2VfaWQiOiIiLCJwcm9kdWN0X2lkIjoicF81OWZhODE4NWE2YzhiX01wN3RlSUpBIiwiYXBwX2lkIjoiYXBwUnJ4VWtkSG84MDU3Iiwic2hhcmVfdXNlcl9pZCI6InVfNTlmYzNjMjA2Y2I1N19uc3Q3UUZndTJDIiwic2hhcmVfdHlwZSI6NX0\">好中文写作课</a></strong>&nbsp;,毅然报名并意外的坚持了下来,</p> \n  <p>是以, 能作为幸存者来将 <strong><a href=\"http://h5.xiaoeknow.com/content_page/eyJ0eXBlIjozLCJyZXNvdXJjZV90eXBlIjoiIiwicmVzb3VyY2VfaWQiOiIiLCJwcm9kdWN0X2lkIjoicF81OWZhODE4NWE2YzhiX01wN3RlSUpBIiwiYXBwX2lkIjoiYXBwUnJ4VWtkSG84MDU3Iiwic2hhcmVfdXNlcl9pZCI6InVfNTlmYzNjMjA2Y2I1N19uc3Q3UUZndTJDIiwic2hhcmVfdHlwZSI6NX0\">好中文</a></strong>&nbsp;的故事分享给大家伙儿…</p> \n  <p>是的, 这门课是本质上的<code>课</code>:</p> \n  <p><img alt=\"8AB2\" src=\"http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27562-1b9138404aba0cf2.gif?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip\" /></p> \n  <p>小篆的”课”字是个形声兼会意字. 左边的言字旁是形符, 表示这个字与讲话发言有关.&nbsp;右边的”果”是读音. </p> \n  <ul> \n   <li><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>课”的本义是按照一定的标准进行试验,考核,以检验成果. </li> \n   <li>所以引申为国家根据数额征收赋税,如:国课,课税</li> \n   <li>按照规定的内容和分量,教授和学习称之为”课”</li> \n   <li>按照规定的教学内容,教学时间所设置的教学科目,也称之为”课”</li> \n   <li><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>课”也用来表示教学单位,如:一节课.&nbsp;也表示教授的段落,如:这本教材共有十五课. </li> \n  </ul> \n  <p>所以本质的<code>课</code>:</p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>按照本义, 上课,其实就应该是来<code>向</code>先生阐述所得, 印证学习成果来的 \n    <ul> \n     <li>所谓&nbsp;言</li> \n     <li>以证&nbsp;果</li> \n     <li>是然&nbsp;课</li> \n    </ul> </li> \n   <li>只是,&nbsp;向先生阐述的,是之前,约定的课题/问题/疑题/试题….</li> \n   <li>只有这样,每个人,才是真正用自个儿最有效的方式在正确的方向上积累智慧</li> \n   <li>以往,所谓 “上课” 其实变成了: \n    <ul> \n     <li>老师求学生记忆单元知识点</li> \n     <li>如若不然,用考试用分数用体罚&nbsp;来加以开导</li> \n     <li>至于强填到学生脑子里的东西,老师一般也不以为然的</li> \n     <li>反正,考卷怎么要求,就怎么教</li> \n    </ul> </li> \n   <li>回想一下,可怕嘛?!&nbsp;挺可怕的,但是,大家也20几年熬过来了</li> \n   <li>可是,为什么又主动要求, 再来”享受”这种无谓的灌输呢?! <code>斯德哥尔摩综合症</code> ?</li> \n  </ul> \n  <p><strong><a href=\"http://h5.xiaoeknow.com/content_page/eyJ0eXBlIjozLCJyZXNvdXJjZV90eXBlIjoiIiwicmVzb3VyY2VfaWQiOiIiLCJwcm9kdWN0X2lkIjoicF81OWZhODE4NWE2YzhiX01wN3RlSUpBIiwiYXBwX2lkIjoiYXBwUnJ4VWtkSG84MDU3Iiwic2hhcmVfdXNlcl9pZCI6InVfNTlmYzNjMjA2Y2I1N19uc3Q3UUZndTJDIiwic2hhcmVfdHlwZSI6NX0\">好中文写作课</a></strong> 回归<code>课</code> 的本源,</p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>专注唯一的命题:&nbsp;什么是好中文?</li> \n   <li>无私的分享佩哥哥半个世纪以来有关中文写作的深入思考</li> \n   <li>当然, 最 <span class=\"caps\">COOL</span> 的就是佩哥哥,&nbsp;打死都不会直接说出来好中文的写作机密的</li> \n   <li>只是通过一个个精心泡制的故事/任务/聊天/…</li> \n   <li>以及神奇的学员们结成的全新课程空间</li> \n   <li>来用半年时间焖熟你自己,&nbsp;将好中文卤入味到所有人心神中</li> \n  </ul> \n  <p>好玩儿卟? 那么立即报名吧—&gt;<strong><a href=\"http://h5.xiaoeknow.com/content_page/eyJ0eXBlIjozLCJyZXNvdXJjZV90eXBlIjoiIiwicmVzb3VyY2VfaWQiOiIiLCJwcm9kdWN0X2lkIjoicF81OWZhODE4NWE2YzhiX01wN3RlSUpBIiwiYXBwX2lkIjoiYXBwUnJ4VWtkSG84MDU3Iiwic2hhcmVfdXNlcl9pZCI6InVfNTlmYzNjMjA2Y2I1N19uc3Q3UUZndTJDIiwic2hhcmVfdHlwZSI6NX0\">好中文写作课</a></strong></p> \n  <p>还是有点儿小纠结? 欢迎明晩(2017-11-10)20:00 来小鹅直播间: <strong><a href=\"https://st.h5.xiaoe-tech.com/st/9GMIuwZcW\">怂怼录 ~&nbsp;大妈的好中文私人体验回哞</a></strong></p> \n  <p>亲声尝试用<strong>42分钟</strong> 嗯哼清楚 <strong><a \n<p>因各种网站发布的年代, 使用技术各不相同, 但是好在都能依托 <code>*-pages</code> 服务快速发布:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>github/gitlab&nbsp;为核心</li> \n <li>免费 <span class=\"caps\">SSL</span>&nbsp;认证为基础</li> \n <li>最好能一次配置长期可用</li> \n</ul> \n<h2 id=\"logging\">logging<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jump-into-ssl.html#logging\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>整体上, 无论在哪个 <code>*-pages</code> 平台, 要折腾的事儿相似,&nbsp;就3步:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>追加配置含 <code>SSL</code> 解析能力的 <span class=\"caps\">DNS</span> 服务主机 <code>A</code> 地址 \n  <ul> \n   <li>并解决引发的有关 <code>CANEM</code> 冲突问题</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>在 <code>*-pages</code> 平台配置 <code>Enforce HTTPS</code> 有关嗯哼</li> \n <li>优雅的等待一切生效 ;-) \n  <ul> \n   <li>并解决可能的资源冲突问题</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ul> \n<h3 id=\"gh-pages\">gh-pages<a \n<p><img alt=\"暂时默认\" src=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/_images/ssl-gh-pages-revert-domain.png\" /></p> \n<ul> \n <li>然而,&nbsp;这肯定不是俺要的效果哪…</li> \n <li>进一步的, 发现, 这是 <code>DNSPod</code> 的问题</li> \n <li>namecheap 等等, 其它老厂, 是支持这种 <code>A</code> 记录和 <code>CNAME</code> 记录指向不同的</li> \n <li> <p>所以,&nbsp;回查当初域名服务商:</p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>才发现, 因为抢注的早, 当年支付私人购买 <code>.io</code> 的&nbsp;iwantmyname.com</li> \n   <li>实在太弱,&nbsp;根本没有完备的域名配置服务</li> \n   <li>而且一直以来域名托管年费也比其它大厂贵一倍</li> \n   <li>说不得,&nbsp;只能迁移了:</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li> <p>先 <code>unlock</code></p> </li> \n <li>获得 <code>Transfer Auth Code</code></li> \n <li>再到 namecheap&nbsp;发起转移工单</li> \n <li>再回 iwantmyname&nbsp;同意转移</li> \n <li>等待生效</li> \n <li>再将 DNSPod 上对应各种配置, 逐一手工配置回 namecheap&nbsp;中</li> \n <li>再对应增补 <span class=\"caps\">SSL</span> 依赖的 gh-pages 有关配置: \n  <ul> \n   <li>blog 主机 <code>A</code> 记录-&gt;<code>185.199.111.153</code></li> \n   <li>blog 主机 <code>CNAME</code> -&gt; <code>ZoomQuiet.github.io.</code></li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ul> \n<p>迁移前:</p> \n<blockquote> \n <p>༄ dig zoomquiet.io +nostats +nocomments&nbsp;+nocmd</p> \n</blockquote> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n class=\"caps\">SSL</span>&nbsp;已生效</p> \n<p><img alt=\"检验\" src=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/_images/ssl-chrome-chk.png\" /></p> \n<p>当然, 原先模板中一系列资源指向老 <code>http</code> 资源都无法使用了</p> \n<p><img alt=\"资源丢失\" src=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/_images/ssl-res-load-err.png\" /></p> \n<p>修订配置文件 <code>pelicanconf.py</code>: </p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">SITEURL</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"err\">'</span><span class=\"n\">http</span><span class=\"o\">:</span><span class=\"c1\">//blog.zoomquiet.io'</span>\n<span class=\"o\">--&gt;</span>\n        <span class=\"err\">'</span><span class=\"n\">https</span><span class=\"o\">:</span><span class=\"c1\">//blog.zoomquiet.io'</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>但是, 进行 push&nbsp;失败:</p> \n<div 冲突\" src=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/_images/SSL-dnspod-cname-error.png\" /></p> \n<blockquote> \n <p>不得以, 迁移回 neamcheap 来配置,&nbsp;顺畅完成:</p> \n</blockquote> \n<p><img alt=\"neamcheap 可配\" id=\"pages\">pages<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jump-into-ssl.html#pages\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h4> \n<blockquote> \n <p>配置证书前, 得先生成, gitlab 不象 github 为用户自动生成,&nbsp;得自行嗯哼</p> \n</blockquote> \n<ul> \n <li>先安装 <a href=\"https://certbot.eff.org/\">Certbot</a></li> \n <li><a href=\"https://letsencrypt.org/\">Let’s Encrypt</a>&nbsp;官方推出的证书生成工具</li> \n</ul> \n<blockquote> \n <p>brew install&nbsp;certbot</p> \n</blockquote> \n<p>然后手工给对应域名生成密匙对:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">$</span> <span class=\"n\">sudo</span> <span class=\"n\">certbot</span> <span class=\"n\">certonly</span> <span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"n\">a</span> <span class=\"n\">manual</span> <span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"n\">d</span> <span class=\"mf\">101.</span><span class=\"n\">camp</span> <span class=\"o\">--</span><span class=\"n\">email</span> <span class=\"n\">zoom</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span 参数可以叠加</li> \n <li>不过, 毎生成一个,&nbsp;必须同时完成自证检验,才能继续</li> \n <li>否则,&nbsp;等于放弃当前生成的密匙</li> \n</ul> \n<blockquote> \n <p>即,&nbsp;蔱根据提示完成:</p> \n</blockquote> \n<hr> \n <div class=\"highlight\"> \n  <pre><span class=\"n\">Create</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span> <span class=\"n\">file</span> <span class=\"n\">containing</span> <span class=\"n\">just</span> <span class=\"n\">this</span> <span <code>.well-known/acme-challenge/iIpSoAbePDhDmGwPUDfER-Czl_bxduu2Cp6qE-IxjLI</code> 目录</li> \n  <li>并在其中构建 <code>index.html</code> 文件</li> \n  <li>文件内容就那一行提供的用来检验的数据</li> \n  <li>当然, 对于 gl-pages&nbsp;网站</li> \n  <li>只是手工建立目录和文件,&nbsp;复制进入数据</li> \n  <li>再 <code>git push</code> 就好</li> \n  <li>只是, 按回车前, 一定要先 \n   <ul> \n    <li>访问那个 <span class=\"caps\">URI</span></li> \n <p><img alt=\"还未安全\" src=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/_images/SSL-chrome-chk-CA-ok.png\" /></p> \n <p>最后…</p> \n <p><img alt=\"部分安全\" src=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/_images/SSL-chrome-chk-info.png\" /></p> \n <p>这是因为有的图片/css/js 资源, 还是用 hhtp 引用的,&nbsp;得升级:</p> \n <p><img alt=\"iPic\" src=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/_images/ipic-http.png\" /></p> \n <p>俺采购的工具, 才发现主要图床还是 http&nbsp;的</p> \n <p>追查文档:</p> \n <p><img alt=\"7牛有关页面\" src=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/_images/SSL-7niu-cdn.png\" /></p> \n <blockquote> \n  <p>对比隔壁&nbsp;…</p> \n </blockquote> \n <p><img alt=\"UPYUN 有关页面\" src=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/_images/SSL-upyun-https.png\" /></p> \n <p>嚓, 这不很明显,&nbsp;只能选择后者了…</p> \n <ul> \n  <li>当然,&nbsp;又引发了欠费等等额外处置事务</li> \n  <li>那就是另外的故事了</li> \n  <li>但是, 反正可以先直接用 gl-pages 空间嘛 \n   <ul> \n    <li>已经 <span class=\"caps\">HHTPS</span>&nbsp;光辉笼罩下的资源渠道…</li> \n   </ul> </li> \n </ul> \n <p><img alt=\"一切安全\" src=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/_images/SSL-chrome-chk-good.png\" /></p> \n <p>终于…收功</p> \n <h2 id=\"ipic\">iPic<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jump-into-ssl.html#ipic\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n <blockquote> \n  <p>是的, mac 下 docker&nbsp;工具中最接地气的了</p> \n </blockquote> \n <p>在和有关人士沟通后, 人工通过了俺单域名免费 <span class=\"caps\">SSL</span> 的订单, 然后发现和对应 bucket&nbsp;的配合是这样的:</p> \n <ul> \n  <li>首先,在 <span class=\"caps\">SSL</span> 采购界面中,点击 <code>补全</code></li> \n </ul> \n <p><img alt=\"补全\" src=\"https://ipic.zoomquiet.top/2019-02-13-%E5%B1%8F%E5%B9%95%E5%BF%AB%E7%85%A7%202019-02-13%2016.19.48.png\" /></p> \n <ul> \n  <li>然后才有域名绑定界面出现,&nbsp;当然的要求先备案</li> \n </ul> \n <p><img alt=\"SSL 配置\" src=\"https://ipic.zoomquiet.top/2019-02-13-%E5%B1%8F%E5%B9%95%E5%BF%AB%E7%85%A7%202019-02-13%2016.32.44.png\" /></p> \n <ul> \n D&nbsp;方案</li> \n <li>那一瞬间,提出的逻辑听起来的确可以将童话/故事/传说都嗯哼成一个整体篇章呢…</li> \n <li>72小时过去, 所有人内心说,&nbsp;玩崩了…</li> \n <li>再回来看作业内容, 才发现最大的坑是: <code>微言大义</code> \n  <ul> \n   <li>而圣经早已用千年时间</li> \n   <li>将人间一切 <code>微言大义</code> 的原型都包含进来了</li> \n   <li>那么多文豪用尽一生都没跳出圣经的五指山来</li> \n   <li>想随便嗯哼出一则仅仅看起来有 <code>微言大义</code> 味道的故事,&nbsp;都是如此的狂妄哪…</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>文件命题什么的混乱就不用说了… \n  <ul> \n title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>将15000字左右的小说,&nbsp;压缩为700字短文</p> \n<ul> \n <li>逐字琢磨才发现: \n  <ul> \n   <li>故事本身永远比任何附加物要动人</li> \n   <li>任何一个线索都必须前后呼应,但不宜超过4次嗯哼</li> \n   <li>任何一个词都不可重复再用,&nbsp;除非没有更好的选择</li> \n   <li>目之所及,3行以内,不应该有相同的措辞</li> \n   <li>句中凡是能删除而句义不变的,都是废字,可删除 \n    <ul> \n     <li>的地得,基本都是废字</li> \n     <li>一个&nbsp;也是…</li> \n     <li>然而,&nbsp;有足够理由,还是得用</li> \n     <li>那什么样的理由足够呢?…</li> \n    </ul> </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>进一步的, 所谓 <code>微言大义</code> 的圣味: \n  <ul> \n   <li>若 <code>舌尖体</code> 本质以中华文明代言,从而瞬息万里扶摇灵动…</li> \n   <li><code>圣经体</code> 本质是代上帝言说,从 神的角度陈述事实而已 \n    <ul> \n     <li>是以能从极度抽象到极度具象</li> \n     <li>肆意跳跃,又真诚无匹,形成至上感染力…</li> \n    </ul> </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>所以,形成稳定文本后,开始: \n  <ul> \n   <li>虚词清除一轮</li> \n   <li>悦耳选词一轮</li> \n   <li>故事逻辑一轮</li> \n   <li>具象加持一轮</li> \n   <li>大义夯实一轮</li> \n   <li>…</li> \n   <li>期望一轮轮和合过去</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ul> \n<p>可惜,没时间了目测,&nbsp;这次顶多一只小狸子嗯哼出来也…</p> \n<h3 id=\"_4\">案例外一篇<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170305-S06E05g56-re-humm.html#_4\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>最后一个版本的结尾是这样的:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">不知多久</span> <span class=\"err\">他渐渐苏醒</span> <span class=\"err\">寻着光</span> <span class=\"err\">蹒跚前行</span> \n<span class=\"err\">走出洞口</span> <span class=\"err\">满眼岩石与黄沙</span>\n<span class=\"err\">极目望去</span> <span class=\"err\">远方是塔</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>但是,从什么样儿和合而来的?!</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n \n<p>4和:爆发出全新的气势大家拜服务</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">不知多久</span> <span class=\"err\">易卜拉欣渐渐苏醒</span> <span class=\"err\">寻着光</span> <span class=\"err\">蹒跚前行</span>\n<span <pre><span class=\"err\">走出岩洞</span> <span class=\"err\">满眼岩石与黄沙</span>\n<span class=\"err\">极目远望</span> <span class=\"err\">远方是塔</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>6和:虚词杀尽</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">极目前望</span> <span class=\"err\">远方是塔</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>7和:远字呆重</p> \n<p>和合结果—&gt; <code>极目望去 远方是塔</code></p> \n<h2 id=\"_5\">是也乎<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170305-S06E05g56-re-humm.html#_5\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>~&nbsp;回顾这一周</p> \n<ul> \n <li>和合技是什么? \n  <ul> \n   <li>是包含流程/工具/环境/积累…综合性技巧</li> \n   <li>用以高效统合团队所有人的能力/激情/创造力/..</li> \n   <li>对目标文本,得以完备进行各种层面的持续优化</li> \n   <li>最终达到圣经和合本的那种效果</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>和合中最难的是什么? \n  <ul> \n   <li>故事核心难以原创,可以打动人心的早已写出来过了</li> \n   <li>递进的章节关系</li> \n   <li>通篇使用词语的相同意境选择</li> \n   <li>…以及其它42种要素…</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>如果下次再小组和合应该如何改进? \n  <ul> \n   <li>题目理解要认真再认真!</li> \n   <li>和合流程,要规划再规划,共识再共识!</li> \n   <li>github&nbsp;还是原有的用法最合适..</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ul>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 05 Mar 2017 12:42:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"9c6f2c7725bc3894f24e0b8689b6309e","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"ZoomQuiet","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148758},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"EKR to Chinese programmer","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/ekr-selfintro-for-chinese.html","description":"<h1 id=\"leo\">Leo 作者向中国开发者的自述<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/ekr-selfintro-for-chinese.html#leo\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<p><img alt=\"EKR\" src=\"https://d262ilb51hltx0.cloudfront.net/max/700/1*yKVZtcJyfh-FHNEtXrqjPw.jpeg\" /></p> \n<p><a href=\"http://leoeditor.com/\">Leo</a> is OpenSource,written by Python,can run in M$/Linux/<span class=\"caps\">MAC</span>/etc. ,Leo is Literate Environment Outline-oriented ;-) <span class=\"caps\">EKR</span> is her&nbsp;father.</p> \n<p><span class=\"caps\">BUT</span>, what is “Literate” ,is hard to explained, i try and try and try to show/share to Chinese People, <span class=\"caps\">BUT</span>… next week,there is another chance for try again, and ask <span class=\"caps\">EKR</span> say some abt. self… So! <span class=\"caps\">EKR</span> writed down his colorful&nbsp;life!</p> \n<p>​I’ve been interested in computers from the time I was about 10 years&nbsp;old.</p> \n<p>I studied mathematics at Michigan State University and computer science at the University of Wisconsin, Madison. There I meant my friend and mentor, <span class=\"caps\">D.R.</span>(Bob) Fitzwater. Bob encouraged me to focus more on design, less on the “bits”. He died several years ago—he would have enjoyed what has happened&nbsp;since.</p> \n<p>When I first learned to program, my programs were “brittle”: changing one part would break another. For several years I wanted to know how to solve this&nbsp;problem.</p> \n<p>My first programming job was at <span class=\"caps\">IBM</span> in Kingston New York. This was about 1974. I didn’t like corporate culture. The problem was my own immaturity, not the people at <span class=\"caps\">IBM</span>. Still, I’m happy I&nbsp;left.</p> \n<p>While at <span class=\"caps\">IBM</span> I studied the ideas of people like Edsjer Dijkstra and especially the great David L. Parnas. Parnas was writing before languages had classes. In fact, his ideas are the reason that Leo’s classes have remained unchanged in concept even though they have been rewritten many&nbsp;times.</p> \n<p>I left <span class=\"caps\">IBM</span> after less than a year. For a while I owned a computer store in Madison Wisconsin, where I have lived ever since. The store didn’t turn out too&nbsp;well… </p> \n<p>I married Rebecca in 1980, and we have been a happy team ever since. Leo would not have been born without her. Rebecca and I have two children, James and Linda. James is 30, Linda&nbsp;23.</p> \n<p>About this time I started a computer business selling Sherlock, a tracing tool for C programs:&nbsp;https://sourceforge.net/projects/leo/files/Miscellaneous/Sherlock/ </p> \n<p>I received a patent for it, but the business went nowhere. Sherlock is not needed for tracing Python programs: the pattern used in Leo suffices. The ideas behind Sherlock really ought to be part of Python’s logging framework. Levels of logging are feeble compared to individually named and targeted&nbsp;logs.</p> \n<p>I worked (from home) for about a year for a company called Tuple in Ballard, Washington. I wrote (in C) a very fast optimizing C compiler, assembler, linker and unix-like file system for them. See the <span class=\"caps\">CC2</span> stuff at: https://sourceforge.net/projects/leo/files/Miscellaneous/<span class=\"caps\">CC2</span>%20and%20Psyco/</p> \n<p>This was before the days of unit tests! At that time, having the compiler compile itself was pretty much how testing was&nbsp;done!</p> \n<p>I’ve been a fan of Donald Knuth ever since graduate school. I studied his books about&nbsp;TeX:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">Volume</span> <span class=\"n\">A</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">The</span> <span class=\"n\">TeXbook</span> <span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">Reading</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">Massachusetts</span><span class=\"o\">:</span> <span class=\"n\">Addison</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"n\">Wesley</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"mi\">1984</span><span class=\"p\">),</span> <span class=\"n\">x</span><span class=\"o\">+</span><span class=\"mi\">483</span><span class=\"n\">pp</span><span class=\"p\">.</span> \n<span class=\"n\">ISBN</span> <span class=\"mi\">0</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">201</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">13447</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">0</span>\n\n<span class=\"n\">Volume</span> <span class=\"n\">B</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">TeX</span><span class=\"o\">:</span> <span class=\"n\">The</span> <span class=\"n\">Program</span> <span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">Reading</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">Massachusetts</span><span class=\"o\">:</span> <span class=\"n\">Addison</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"n\">Wesley</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"mi\">1986</span><span class=\"p\">),</span> <span class=\"n\">xviii</span><span class=\"o\">+</span><span class=\"mi\">600</span><span class=\"n\">pp</span><span class=\"p\">.</span> <span class=\"n\">ISBN</span> <span class=\"mi\">0</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">201</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">13437</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">3</span>\n\n<span class=\"n\">Volume</span> <span class=\"n\">B</span> <span class=\"n\">is</span> <span class=\"n\">written</span> <span class=\"n\">in</span> <span class=\"n\">Pascal</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"o\">!</span><span class=\"p\">)</span> <span class=\"n\">and</span> <span class=\"n\">organized</span> <span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"k\">if</span> <span class=\"n\">you</span> <span class=\"n\">can</span> <span class=\"n\">call</span> <span class=\"n\">it</span> <span class=\"n\">that</span><span class=\"p\">)</span> <span class=\"n\">using</span> <span class=\"n\">Knuth</span><span class=\"err\">'</span><span class=\"n\">s</span> <span class=\"n\">WEB</span> <span class=\"n\">system</span><span class=\"p\">.</span> <span class=\"n\">I</span> <span class=\"n\">studied</span> <span class=\"n\">WEB</span> <span class=\"n\">intensely</span><span class=\"p\">.</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>Despite understanding bits and pieces of the 600-page code in volume B, I really didn’t understand the code. I asked myself, why is this so hard to understand? After perhaps 6 months of wondering, the basis of Leo came to me: webs are outlines in disguise. Actually, <em>all</em> programs are outlines in&nbsp;disguise.</p> \n<p>You can read about the rest of Leo’s history here:&nbsp;http://leoeditor.com/appendices.html#history-of-leo</p> \n<p>I learned about Python in 2001. I was working on the Python version of Leo on September&nbsp;11.</p> \n<p>Two years ago I got interested in Guido’s keynote about static type checking. I contacted him and started this project:&nbsp;https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/python-static-type-checking</p> \n<p>I spent lots of time learning how to traverse parse trees quickly. That’s not nothing, but it’s only the beginning of the task. Perhaps next year I’ll be able to do for type analysis what I did for traversing parse trees&nbsp;;-)</p> \n<p>​ And that’s about it. I’ve ever only been interested in programming. I love seeing how other people use Leo, but such excursions are not for me. I remain interested in programming because it has never been easy for&nbsp;me.</p> \n<p>I am a mediocre wei chi player, despite many lessons from Yang Yi-Lun 杨以伦, pro 7 dan: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yilun_Yang I do know enough to appreciate famous&nbsp;games. </p> \n<p>One of my favorites was played between the two great rivals Go Seigen 吳清源 and Kitani Minoru 木谷 実 on March 20, 1932. Go Seigen won by resignation, despite losing about 25&nbsp;stones.</p> \n<p>I play the piano and take lessons from a great musician, Michael Butkus-Bomier: http://www.michaelbb.info/ I enjoy painting. About 20 years ago I received a black belt in&nbsp;karate.</p> \n<p><span class=\"caps\">HTH</span>.</p> \n<blockquote> \n <blockquote> \n  <blockquote> \n   <p>试译如下:</p> \n  </blockquote> \n </blockquote> \n</blockquote> \n<p>10岁开始,俺就对计算机上了心.</p> \n<p>俺是密歇根州立大学数学系的,也是威斯康星大学麦迪逊学院计算机系的.在那儿,遇到了俺的导师(Bob) Fitzwater教授,他建议俺多关注设计,而不仅仅是”字节”. 几年前,Bob&nbsp;已仙去,不过,他要是知道俺在折腾什么一定会很高兴.</p> \n<p>开始编程时,俺的程序特色是”脆”:某处囧了,另外的也会杯具.&nbsp;那些年俺一直在想法解决这种事儿!</p> \n<p>俺第一份程序猿工作是在1974年进入 <span class=\"caps\">IBM</span> (Kingston New York). 俺并不喜欢企业文化,当然问题在俺不在 <span class=\"caps\">IBM</span>,&nbsp;总之很高兴俺及时离开了.</p> \n<p>有<span class=\"caps\">IBM</span> 俺接触到象 Edsjer Dijkstra 或是 伟大的 David L. Parnas 们的想法.Parnas写的书面语言类, 诱发了 Leo&nbsp;的类概念无论怎么重写都不会改变!</p> \n<p>离开 <span class=\"caps\">IBM</span>&nbsp;快一年时.有一阵子,俺在威斯康星的麦迪逊那儿有个电脑店.事儿并不忙… </p> \n<p>1980年,俺同 Rebecca 结婚了,从此有了俺自个儿的快乐团队.如果没有她, Leo 也诞生不出来. Rebecca 和俺有两个娃儿,James 和 Linda. 现在 James 30, Linda&nbsp;23.</p> \n<p>大约这时期,俺开始销售 Sherlock, 针对C程序的追踪工具.: https://sourceforge.net/projects/leo/files/Miscellaneous/Sherlock/ 俺拥有相关专科,但是没什么业务.Sherlock 没必要对 Python 程序进行追踪: Leo 足够用了! Sherlock背后的想法的确出自Python&nbsp;的日志框架.分级的日志绝对比苍白的命名式日志要好用的多.</p> \n<p>俺为华盛顿一家名为”Tuple in Ballard”的公司<span class=\"caps\">SOHO</span> 了一年, 写(用C)了些很快的编译器,汇编器,链接器,以及 Unix样的文件系统.参考 <span class=\"caps\">CC2</span>: https://sourceforge.net/projects/leo/files/Miscellaneous/<span class=\"caps\">CC2</span>%20and%20Psyco/&nbsp;这儿是几天前的集成测试结果!当时,编译过编译器自身比跑通测试重要的多.</p> \n<p>毕业以来,俺一直是高纳德的粉丝. 学习过他有关TeX&nbsp;的书.包括:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">卷</span><span class=\"n\">A</span><span class=\"p\">,</span><span class=\"n\">TeXbook</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"err\">阅读</span><span class=\"p\">,</span><span class=\"err\">马萨诸塞州</span><span class=\"o\">:</span><span class=\"n\">Addison</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"n\">Wesley</span><span class=\"err\">出版社</span><span class=\"p\">,</span><span class=\"mi\">1984</span><span class=\"p\">),</span><span class=\"n\">X</span><span class=\"o\">+</span><span class=\"mi\">483</span><span class=\"err\">页</span><span class=\"p\">.</span>  <span class=\"n\">ISBN0</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">201</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">13447</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">0</span>\n\n<span class=\"err\">卷</span><span class=\"n\">B</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">TEX</span><span class=\"o\">:</span><span class=\"err\">程序</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"err\">阅读</span><span class=\"p\">,</span><span class=\"err\">马萨诸塞州</span><span class=\"o\">:</span><span class=\"n\">Addison</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"n\">Wesley</span><span class=\"err\">出版社</span><span class=\"p\">,</span><span class=\"mi\">1986</span><span class=\"p\">),</span><span class=\"mi\">18</span><span class=\"o\">+</span><span class=\"mi\">600</span><span class=\"err\">页</span><span class=\"p\">.</span>  <span class=\"n\">ISBN0</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">201</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">13437</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">3</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>B卷是用 Pascal(!) 完成并组织的(甚至于可以调用它),运用了 高纳德的 <span class=\"caps\">WEB</span> 系统.俺立即对 <span class=\"caps\">WEB</span>&nbsp;系统着迷了.</p> \n<p>尽管对卷B 600多页中散布的代码进行了反复理解,依然一头雾水.俺反问自个儿,有这么难嘛?又过了大约半年, 完成了 Leo&nbsp;的主要部分后,回过味儿来:</p> \n<p><span class=\"caps\">WEB</span> 就是变形的大纲&nbsp;事实上:</p> \n<p>一切程序都是大纲的变形 ! Leo 其余的历史可以在这儿查阅:&nbsp;http://leoeditor.com/appendices.html#history-of-leo</p> \n<p>俺在2001 年才学的 Python.同年9月11日开始,就用Python 来构建 Leo&nbsp;了.</p> \n<p>两年前俺关注到 Guido 有关静态类型检查的报告.于是联系上他启动了这个项目:&nbsp;https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/python-static-type-checking</p> \n<p>俺花了大量的时间来学习如何快速遍历语法树.这不算什么事儿,但却是此任务的必然起点. 也许明年俺能基于语法树开展类型分析了&nbsp;;-)</p> \n<p>(嚓! 王珢的 https://github.com/yinwang0/pysonar2 已经折腾很<span class=\"caps\">NB</span>&nbsp;;-)</p> \n<p>是也乎,俺就是对编程感兴趣.俺喜欢见证大家对 Leo 的喜爱,&nbsp;但是,这不会是俺的一切.俺保持编程的兴趣,因为对俺这从来不是简单的事儿.</p> \n<p>俺是名普通的围棋爱好者, 从 Yang Yi-Lun (杨以伦)那儿学了很多, pro 7 dan: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yilun_Yang 俺能欣赏历史上知名的对弈, 其中最喜欢的是 1932年3月20号 吳清源 同 木谷 実(Kitani Minoru)的对战.尽管少了25颗棋子,但吳清源最终赢了! 俺也弹钢琴,并学习了伟大的 Michael Butkus-Bomier 的课程: http://www.michaelbb.info/ 俺也享受绘画.&nbsp;另外20年前,俺也拿到了空手道的黒带.</p> \n<p>以上.</p> \n<h2 id=\"changelog\">Changelog<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/ekr-selfintro-for-chinese.html#changelog\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<ul> \n <li>140107 move into Pelican as&nbsp;zoomquiet.io</li> \n <li>131106 pub. <a href=\"https://medium.com/i-m-h-o/9520fee0b59f\"><span class=\"caps\">EKR</span> to Chinese programmer — <span class=\"caps\">I. 16:00:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"d77e5a0ff190d685981a0fa75f0ea139","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"Zoom.Quiet","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148759},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"reply On literate programming","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/reply-yw-on-literate-programming.html","description":"<p><a href=\"http://yinwang0.wordpress.com/2011/05/18/literate-programming/\">On Literate Programming | Surely I Am&nbsp;Joking</a></p> \n<p>对于文学化编程,俺使用的是 Leo :&nbsp;http://wiki.woodpecker.org.cn/moin/LeoEnvironment</p> \n<p>你提及的:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>丢失了全景思考</li> \n <li>程序不仅仅是文本</li> \n <li>人的语言/认知&nbsp;至上</li> \n <li>痛苦的导航</li> \n</ul> \n<p>几个观点中,俺非常同意的是:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>目前并没有一个,可以真正统一人的思想以及程序代码形式的编辑方式/环境</li> \n</ul> \n<p>但是,目前为止,在代码的语法结构维度之上,可以给予我们一个可以自在记录原始思路的编辑方式,应该只有 <span class=\"caps\">LP</span> 了; 从俺使用 Leo 进行各种编辑/编程&nbsp;的体验而言</p> \n<ul> \n <li><span class=\"caps\">LP</span>&nbsp;其实是关注包含时间维度的代码的变迁过程,而不是简单的精细化切分</li> \n <li>其实,到最后看起来是碎片的代码片段,以及关系,并不是从一开始就形成的</li> \n <li>而是在开发的过程中,逐步抽象/提取而成的</li> \n <li>也就是説,在 <span class=\"caps\">LP</span>&nbsp;的编辑思想中,人的整体思路是最重要的对象,是必须随时加以记录的</li> \n</ul> \n<p>程序当然不仅仅是文本</p> \n<ul> \n <li>但是,程序只能以文本形式来管理/编辑/传播吼,,,</li> \n <li>当然的,因为 <span class=\"caps\">LP</span> 不关心&nbsp;程序文本的运行时结构,所以,无法自动跳转到相关定义…</li> \n <li>不过,俺感受到的是:</li> \n <li>记不住的就是不重要的</li> \n <li>不知道的就是不必要的</li> \n <li>如附件截屏:</li> \n <li>Leo&nbsp;通过可视化的树形结点来记录了我对程序的整体思考</li> \n <li>而右方的编辑区,永远只是当前结点的内容</li> \n</ul> \n<p>也就是説,通过 Leo&nbsp;进行文学化编程的整体过程是一系列相同的重构过程串起来的:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>定个文件的框架</li> \n <li>定个大致的(子)功能流程,每个先以可运行的伪代码记录下来</li> \n <li>进入对应的结点完成功能</li> \n <li>每当超过一定的行数 hold 不住了,说明应该进行重构,将重复部分抽象出去了&nbsp;回到第1或是第2步…</li> \n</ol> \n<p>所以,如果是 Leo&nbsp;这种的文学化编程环境</p> \n<ul> \n <li>并不太需要 <span class=\"caps\">IDE</span>&nbsp;类似的全程自动解析,追踪,导航,以帮助我们快速定位代码</li> \n <li>因为,每次进行修訂的代码片段都足够小,关注的因素也足够少</li> \n <li>而每个足够小的片段,都是从足够大的上层逻辑节点演化来的</li> \n <li>即,有关整体程序的概念,结构,思路,永远在 outline&nbsp;的节点树中有体验</li> \n</ul> \n<p>不过,你点出的工程性问题的确存在</p> \n<ul> \n <li>同 coffeescript , Leo&nbsp;进行编程调试时,一样麻烦在</li> \n <li>如果调试运行时,引发错误的代码,超出当前编程的片段范围时</li> \n <li>错误信息反馈的行数,在 Leo&nbsp;中找不到精确的对应</li> \n <li>所以,只能 到输出的正常文本程序中搜索,明确了代码所在代码段后,才能回到 Leo&nbsp;人工定位到对应的</li> \n</ul> \n<p>期待你的大一统式编程/测试/运行环境!</p> \n<h2 id=\"changelog\">Changelog<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/reply-yw-on-literate-programming.html#changelog\" title=\"Permanent <li><code>screenshot_190213-17.17.32.jpg</code></li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>现在怎么作到?</li> \n</ul> \n<h2 id=\"logging\">logging<a class=\"headerlink\" link\">¶</a></h3> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">$</span> <span class=\"n\">defaults</span> <span class=\"n\">write</span> <span class=\"n\">com</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">apple</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">screencapture</span> <span class=\"n\">name</span> <span class=\"n\">screenshot</span>\n<span class=\"err\">$</span> <span class=\"n\">killall</span> <span class=\"n\">SystemUIServer</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>以上只能变成:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/how2rename-mac-screen-shot.html#screencapturestrings\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>以往可以进行的</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">sudo</span> <span class=\"n\">su</span>\n<span class=\"n\">cd</span> <span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">System</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Library</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">CoreServices</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">SystemUIServer</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">app</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Contents</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Resources</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">strings</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>在 macOS Sierra 10.12.6&nbsp;中失败:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>无论是否是 root&nbsp;身份</li> \n <li>都说系统没有权限</li> \n</ul> \n<h3 id=\"automator\">Automator<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/how2rename-mac-screen-shot.html#automator\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>另外一种思路是用内置自动脚本来刷指定目录中指定文件名的文件名:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>但是, 尝试后发现,&nbsp;这种可视化编程限制太多</li> \n <li>而且调整困难,&nbsp;根本无法有效完成设想</li> \n</ul> \n<h3 id=\"bash\">bash<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/how2rename-mac-screen-shot.html#bash\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>经检测:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">screencapture</span> <span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"n\">io</span> <span class=\"o\">~/</span><span class=\"n\">Desktop</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">screenshot_</span><span class=\"err\">`</span><span class=\"n\">date</span> <span class=\"err\">'</span><span class=\"o\">+%</span><span class=\"n\">y</span><span class=\"o\">%</span><span class=\"n\">m</span><span class=\"o\">%</span><span class=\"n\">d</span><span class=\"o\">-%</span><span class=\"n\">H</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"o\">%</span><span class=\"n\">M</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"o\">%</span><span class=\"n\">S</span><span class=\"err\">'`</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">jpg</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>可以满足所有构想,可是:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>先要打开终端</li> \n <li>运行, 无论是配置为别名, 还是部署为指定 .sh&nbsp;脚本</li> \n <li>然后才能进行截屏</li> \n <li>相比原先随时 <code>cmd+shift+4</code> 进入截屏, 还是多了一层,&nbsp;不方便</li> \n</ul> \n<p>问题变成如何可以用原有快捷键调用 bash&nbsp;指令?</p> \n<ul> \n <li>alfred&nbsp;复杂</li> \n <li>HotKey 只能绑定 .app 使用自定快捷键 \n  <ul> \n   <li>那么问题进一步变成: <code>如何快速将一个 shell 脚本变成标准 mac app?</code></li> \n   <li>果然有很多方式,&nbsp;脚本,编译,应用…</li> \n   <li>试用 Platypus 一下子就形成了无界面后台运行的&nbsp;app</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>配合 HotKay 达成目标效果&nbsp;;-)</li> \n</ul> \n<p><img alt=\"screenshot_190213\" src=\"https://ipic.zoomquiet.top/2019-02-13-screenshot_190213-23.03.43.jpg\" /></p> \n<h2 id=\"refer\">refer<a class=\"headerlink\" Leopard Tips</a> \n  <ul> \n   <li><a href=\"https://www.tekrevue.com/tip/how-to-customize-screenshot-options-in-mac-os-x/\">The Complete Guide to Mac <span class=\"caps\">OS</span> X Screenshots -&nbsp;TekRevue</a></li> \n   <li><a href=\"https://apple.stackexchange.com/questions/27729/changing-the-default-screenshot-filename\">uti - Changing the default screenshot filename - Ask&nbsp;Different</a></li> \n   <li>…</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li><a href=\"https://apple.stackexchange.com/questions/200125/how-to-create-an-osx-application-to-wrap-a-call-to-a-shell-script\">macos - How to create an <span class=\"caps\">OSX</span> Application to wrap a call to a shell script? - Ask Different</a> \n  <ul> \n   <li><a href=\"https://apple.stackexchange.com/questions/103621/run-applescript-from-bash-script\">macos - Run AppleScript from bash script - Ask&nbsp;Different</a></li> \n   <li><a href=\"https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30792569/converting-a-shell-script-into-a-app-file\">macos - Converting a Shell Script Into a *.app File - Stack&nbsp;Overflow</a></li> \n   <li><a href=\"https://christopher.su/2012/creating-mac-applications-shell-scripts/\">Creating Mac Applications from Shell Scripts - Christopher&nbsp;Su</a></li> \n   <li><a href=\"https://sveinbjorn.org/platypus\">Platypus - Create Mac apps from command line scripts&nbsp;|</a></li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ul> \n<h2 id=\"sayeahooo\">Sayeahooo<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/how2rename-mac-screen-shot.html#sayeahooo\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<ul> \n <li>1.5h&nbsp;资料搜索理解</li> \n <li>2h&nbsp;嗯哼</li> \n <li>.5h&nbsp;截屏,文档嗯哼…</li> \n</ul>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 13 Feb 2019 14:42:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"https://ipic.zoomquiet.top/2019-02-13-screenshot_190213-23.03.43.jpg","linkMd5":"700de26915603b1a0c8ffb04f200b1d3","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn82@2020_2/2020/08/24/14-59-18-911_988882a988c32938.webp","destWidth":585,"destHeight":474,"sourceBytes":26132,"destBytes":30258,"author":"Zoom.Quiet","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://ipic.zoomquiet.top/2019-02-13-screenshot_190213-23.03.43.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn82@2020_2/2020/08/24/14-59-18-911_988882a988c32938.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148768},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"How to from Jekyll jump into Pelican","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html","description":"<h1 id=\"jekyll-pelican\">如何从 Jekyll 转进入 Pelican<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#jekyll-pelican\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<p>简述静态网站从 Jekyll 环境中迁移为 纯 Python <a href=\"http://getpelican.com/\">Pelican</a>…</p> \n<p><img alt=\";\" src=\"https://0.gravatar.com/avatar/0cb9d9d7e6b152d24d2b78c6464502a6?d=https%3A%2F%2Fidenticons.github.com%2Fc0b8694f59232c6681a92c4c9fec3e18.png&amp;r=x&amp;s=440\" /></p> \n<h2 id=\"_1\">为毛<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>社区在发展, 原先的 蠎周刊,为方便,使用了 gitcafe 内置的 Jekyll 服务, 所以,其实在使用 Ruby&nbsp;自动编译和发布.</p> \n<p>总是感觉不够纯粹 Pythonic&nbsp;…</p> \n<p>故而,&nbsp;下决心完成迁移</p> \n<h1 id=\"_2\">整体<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<p>忽然发现,俺感觉很直觉的事儿,也写了文档,&nbsp;但是,其它人真正首次上手全然一头雾水…</p> \n<p>所以 <a href=\"http://xiaolai.github.io/alpha/on-learning/\">学习学习再学习 - xiaolai</a>&nbsp;提出的,俺实在无法同意更多..</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Impossible_staircase\" src=\"http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/34/Impossible_staircase.svg\" /></p> \n<p>这是最难的知识结构——它往往看起来跟线性结构没什么区别，但，最终令人迷惑，甚至懊恼。&nbsp;用最直白的话来描述，就是：</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">初级的知识需要对高级知识深入了解才能真正深入了解</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>——你看看这句话多拗口就多少有点概念了。</p> \n<p>所以,还是按照 easy 模式来,&nbsp;先简单的说,再往死里说折腾的技术细节…</p> \n<h2 id=\"_3\">已知条件<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#_3\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p><a href=\"https://help.github.com/articles/user-organization-and-project-pages\">User, Organization and Project&nbsp;Pages</a></p> \n<p>github 的 所谓 <code>pages</code> 服务的本质:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>云端的 Jekell&nbsp;服务</li> \n <li>对约定的仓库,感知变化时,就尝试进行编译</li> \n <li>并自动完成发布(现在是到&nbsp;github.io)</li> \n</ul> \n<p>这里的约定仓库,只有两种情况:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>用户/组织: \n  <ul> \n   <li>比如, 注册成的用户/组织 为&nbsp;https://github.com/foo</li> \n   <li>则, github 尝试进行 <code>pages</code> 发布的仓库为:</li> \n   <li>https://github.com/foo/foo.github.io</li> \n   <li>发布到:&nbsp;https://foo.github.io</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>项目 \n  <ul> \n   <li>任意一个项目仓库,比如,&nbsp;https://github.com/foo/foobar</li> \n   <li>则, githuba 支持自动对此仓库的 <code>gh-pages</code> 分支进行 <code>pages</code> 编译</li> \n   <li>而发布为:&nbsp;https://foo.github.io/foobar</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ol> \n<h2 id=\"pelican\">Pelican行为<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#pelican\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p><a href=\"http://getpelican.com/\">Pelican</a> 呢其实也只是 Python 世界中大堆静态网站发布工具中的一个, 为毛选中这个? 只是因为 42分钟里,大妈将其折腾起来了, 而且官方的文档/案例/样式,的确足够丰富,&nbsp;给人信心…</p> \n<p>而其本身对网站的约定非常简单:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>配置好 <code>pelicanconf.py</code></li> \n <li>在 <code>content</code> 目录中写作</li> \n <li>一键命令编译完成静态网络的生成,组织到 <code>output</code></li> \n</ul> \n<h2 id=\"_4\">所以?方案!<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#_4\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>基于以上的整体理解, 就可以决策怎么基于 github 的 <code>pages</code> 服务,&nbsp;来进行免费的网站发布了;</p> \n<p>目测也就两招:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>在用户/组织 的 <code>pages</code> 仓库中直接部署 Pelican 工程 \n  <ul> \n   <li>只是要在根目录部署一个自动跳转到 <code>output</code> 子目录的 <code>index.html</code> 页面</li> \n   <li>以便发布后可以略过根目录来访问编译结果的内容</li> \n   <li>发布成&nbsp;https://foo.github.io/output</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>用两个仓库, 将用户/组织 的 <code>pages</code> 仓库部署为 <code>output</code> 子目录 \n  <ul> \n   <li>这样就能自动发布为&nbsp;https://foo.github.io</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ol> \n<p>很明显,第二种逼格较髙,所以,就这样办了!</p> \n<h2 id=\"_5\">宏观流程<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#_5\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<ol> \n <li>首次建立本地撰写环境: \n  <ol> \n   <li>安装好 <a href=\"http://getpelican.com/\">Pelican</a></li> \n   <li>分别clone 出两个仓库: \n    <ul> \n     <li>qpython-android.pelican </li> \n     <li>qpython-android.github.io </li> \n    </ul> </li> \n   <li>先在 <code>qpython-android.pelican</code> 中测试确认好 pelical&nbsp;工程可用,并尝试编译</li> \n   <li>一切正确的话,将 <code>qpython-android.github.io</code> 复制覆盖为 <code>qpython-android.pelican/output</code></li> \n  </ol> </li> \n <li>以后,日常的维护就再也不需要 <code>qpython-android.github.io</code> 了! \n  <ol> \n   <li>进入 <code>qpython-android.pelican/content</code> 创建/增补/修订&nbsp;文章</li> \n   <li>回到 <code>qpython-android.pelican</code> 执行 <code>fab build</code></li> \n   <li>本地到 <code>output</code> 打开对应页面检查效果</li> \n   <li>还是在 <code>qpython-android.pelican</code> 执行 <code>fab pub2hub</code> \n    <ul> \n     <li>完成对 <code>qpython-android.github.io</code> 仓库实际的&nbsp;push </li> \n     <li>即, 发布成网站:&nbsp;http://qpython-android.github.io</li> \n    </ul> </li> \n   <li>最后,在 <code>qpython-android.pelican</code> 进行正常的 <code>git add-&gt;ci-&gt;pu</code> \n    <ul> \n     <li>对文章源文本完成到 <code>qpython-android.pelican</code> 仓库的提交</li> \n    </ul> </li> \n  </ol> </li> \n</ol> \n<p>收功!</p> \n<h1 id=\"_6\">细节<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#_6\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<p>然后,&nbsp;再分享俺的折腾过程…</p> \n<h2 id=\"_7\">过程<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#_7\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>整体上,其实就三步:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>选择一个 theme ,完成本地 demo 整明白怎么使用&nbsp;Pelican</li> \n <li>将原先 Jekyll 格式的文章声明部分文本, 批量转化为 Pelican&nbsp;的</li> \n <li>改进发布流程,自动化</li> \n</ol> \n<h3 id=\"theme\">theme<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#theme\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>综合对比了官网收集的一堆样式,选择了 <a href=\"https://github.com/DandyDev/pelican-bootstrap3\">DandyDev</a> 的,根据说明,立即就完成了编译,本地检阅&nbsp;;-)</p> \n<h3 id=\"meta\">meta<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#meta\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>果断使用 Python 脚本,快速完成转换 <a href=\"https://gitcafe.com/CPyUG/weekly/blob/master/_plugins/jekyll2pelican.py\">jekyll2pelican.py</a></p> \n<h3 id=\"fab\">fab<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#fab\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>果断使用 <code>fabric</code> 进行自动化处理!</p> \n<ul> \n <li>参考: <a href=\"https://gitcafe.com/CPyUG/weekly/blob/master/fabfile.py\">fabfile.py</a></li> \n <li>定制了 <code>pub2cafe</code> 完成自动化发布</li> \n</ul> \n<p>因为 <code>gitcafe</code> 只有用户同名-pages 服务,所以,对于当前 <code>蠎周刊</code> 的 Pelican 工程,&nbsp;用两个仓库,配合完成:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre>https://github.com/qpython-android/qpython-android.pelican.git\n    +- ..\n    +- pelicanconf.py   主配置文件\n    +- content          内容目录  \n    +- output           编译输出目录\n    |    `- https://github.com/qpython-android/qpython-android.github.io.git \n    |                          |\n    |                          \\-- 即合法的\n    +- .gitignore       配置忽略 output 目录\n    +- ...\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>这样一来,目录,就不用进入 <code>output</code> 目录进行 git 操作了&nbsp;平时的发布流程就是:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>在 <code>content</code> 目录对应分类子目录中创建 <code>*.md</code> 文本,组织文章</li> \n <li><code>fab build</code> 完成编译,本地检阅文章效果</li> \n <li><code>git add . &amp;&amp; git ci &amp;&amp; git pu</code> 将增补提交</li> \n <li><code>fab pub2cafe</code> 自动完成进入 <code>output</code> 后的一系列 git&nbsp;操作</li> \n</ol> \n<p>对应的&nbsp;配置中:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"c1\">#DELETE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY = True</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>就绝对不能打开注释 不然 <code>output</code> 目录清除,就没有了 <code>.git</code> 也就无法发布了…</p> \n<h2 id=\"_8\">坑<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#_8\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>整个过程中,遇到没有找到文档的小麻烦,自个儿解决了的….</p> \n<h3 id=\"disqus\"><span class=\"caps\">DISQUS</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#disqus\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>果断遇到了 <span class=\"caps\">DISQUS</span> 配置了,不生效的问题,上下折腾, 才发现很多人都遇到了这个问题,&nbsp;追踪到代码:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"c1\">//... pelican-themes/pelican-bootstrap3/templates/includes/comments.html</span>\n<span class=\"c1\">//...</span>\n<span class=\"kd\">var</span> <span class=\"nx\">disqus_shortname</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"s1\">'{{ DISQUS_SITENAME }}'</span><span class=\"p\">;</span> <span class=\"c1\">// required: replace example with your forum shortname</span>\n<span class=\"kd\">var</span> <span class=\"nx\">disqus_identifier</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"s1\">'{{ article.slug }}'</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n<span class=\"kd\">var</span> <span class=\"nx\">disqus_url</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"s1\">'{{ SITEURL }}/{{ article.url }}'</span><span class=\"p\">;</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>才发现 <code>SITEURL</code> 的配置是决定性的, 一定要同 <code>DISQUS</code> 申请时的一致; 本地编译后,&nbsp;看一眼源代码,就知道是否靠谱了…</p> \n<h3 id=\"pages\">pages<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#pages\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>突然发现 <code>content/pages</code> 目录中的文本,是种特殊文章,不但可以出现在导航,而且使用专用的模板, 所以,默认是没有 <code>DISQUS</code> 槽接的!</p> \n<ul> \n <li>参考,俺的<a href=\"https://gitcafe.com/CPyUG/weekly/blob/master/_themes/pelican-bootstrap3/templates/page.html\">page.html</a> </li> \n <li>追加了仿制的: <a href=\"https://gitcafe.com/CPyUG/weekly/blob/master/_themes/pelican-bootstrap3/templates/includes/page_comments.html\">includes/page_comments.html</a></li> \n</ul> \n<p>fixed!</p> \n<h3 id=\"category_feed_atom\">CATEGORY_FEED_ATOM<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#category_feed_atom\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>一时手賎,打开了:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"na\">CATEGORY_FEED_ATOM</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"s\">'feeds/%s.atom.xml'</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>结果,发现不能在模板里简单的完成分类子 <span class=\"caps\">RSS</span>&nbsp;的链接!</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre>    <span class=\"nt\">&lt;i</span> <span class=\"na\">class=</span><span class=\"s\">\"icon-th icon-large\"</span><span class=\"nt\">&gt;&lt;/i&gt;</span>Categories<span class=\"nt\">&lt;/h4&gt;&lt;/li&gt;</span>\n{% for cat, null in categories %}\n    <span class=\"nt\">&lt;li</span> <span class=\"na\">class=</span><span class=\"s\">\"list-group-item\"</span><span class=\"nt\">&gt;</span>\n        <span class=\"nt\">&lt;a</span> <span class=\"na\">href=</span><span class=\"s\">\"{{ SITEURL }}/{{ cat.url }}\"</span><span class=\"nt\">&gt;</span>\n            <span class=\"nt\">&lt;i</span> <span class=\"na\">class=</span><span class=\"s\">\"icon-folder-open icon-large\"</span><span class=\"nt\">&gt;&lt;/i&gt;</span>{{ cat }}\n        <span class=\"nt\">&lt;/a&gt;</span>\n        <span class=\"nt\">&lt;a</span> <span class=\"na\">href=</span><span class=\"s\">\"{{ SITEURL }}/feeds/{{ cat }}.atom.xml\"</span><span class=\"nt\">&gt;</span>\n            <span class=\"nt\">&lt;i</span> <span class=\"na\">class=</span><span class=\"s\">\"icon-rss-sign\"</span><span class=\"nt\">&gt;&lt;/i&gt;</span>\n        <span class=\"nt\">&lt;/a&gt;</span>\n    <span class=\"nt\">&lt;/li&gt;</span>\n{% endfor %}\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>因为这儿的 <code>{{ cat }}</code> 是分类的名称,可能包含大小写字母, 而配置指导下生成的 <span class=\"caps\">RSS</span>&nbsp;文件是全小写的…</p> \n<p>纠结了一会儿,也没有查到对应的文档,突然想到各种内置对象都有的 <code>sulg</code> 属性!</p> \n<p>于是就猜对了… 参考: <a href=\"https://gitcafe.com/CPyUG/weekly/blob/master/_themes/pelican-bootstrap3/templates/includes/sidebar.html#L22\">includes/sidebar.html#22</a></p> \n<h3 id=\"author\">author<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#author\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>原样式作者因为是个人网站,所以,无所谓 <code>Author</code> 的信息, 但是,作为社区用共笔环境,就必须有所体现, 在 <a href=\"https://gitcafe.com/CPyUG/weekly/blob/master/_themes/pelican-bootstrap3/templates/includes/article_info.html\">includes / article_info.html</a>&nbsp;先打开作者的属性输出,</p> \n<p>然后,从别的 theme 工程中抄一个模板: <a href=\"https://gitcafe.com/CPyUG/weekly/blob/master/_themes/pelican-bootstrap3/templates/author.html\">author.html</a></p> \n<p>即好!</p> \n<h3 id=\"toc\"><span class=\"caps\">TOC</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#toc\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>是的,以往 rST/t2t 时,甚至于 Word&nbsp;时都有的 </p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">TOC</span> <span class=\"o\">~</span> <span class=\"err\">章节索引</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>肿么可以没有?!</p> \n<p>果断: <a href=\"https://github.com/getpelican/pelican-plugins/tree/master/extract_toc\">pelican-plugins/extract_toc at master ·&nbsp;getpelican/pelican-plugins</a> </p> \n<p>只是这货竟然是依赖 <code>beautifulsoup4</code> 的! 对于非 <code>UNIX/Linux/MAC</code> 用户而言,&nbsp;人艰不拆哪!!!</p> \n<h2 id=\"_9\">参考:<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/jekyll-to-pelican.html#_9\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<ul> \n <li><a href=\"http://riku.gitcafe.com/pelican-gitcafe.html\">使用 Pelican + GitCafe Page 创建&nbsp;Blog</a></li> \n <li><a href=\"http://blog.imley.net/2013/01/03/disqus-thread-url-issue/#content\">吐槽一下<span class=\"caps\">DISQUS</span>的thread链接错误问题 | Ley’s&nbsp;blog</a></li> \n <li><a GitCafe</a>&nbsp;创建</li> \n</ul> \n<p>…</p>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Thu, 19 Dec 2013 02:42:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"https://0.gravatar.com/avatar/0cb9d9d7e6b152d24d2b78c6464502a6?d=https%3A%2F%2Fidenticons.github.com%2Fc0b8694f59232c6681a92c4c9fec3e18.png&r=x&s=440","linkMd5":"99724aebe89adbd18f99da674f23b017","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn70@2020_5/2020/08/24/14-59-17-490_d36543615a36dec4.webp","destWidth":440,"destHeight":440,"sourceBytes":40807,"destBytes":31854,"author":"Zoom.Quiet","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://0.gravatar.com/avatar/0cb9d9d7e6b152d24d2b78c6464502a6?d=https%3A%2F%2Fidenticons.github.com%2Fc0b8694f59232c6681a92c4c9fec3e18.png&r=x&s=440":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn70@2020_5/2020/08/24/14-59-17-490_d36543615a36dec4.webp","http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/34/Impossible_staircase.svg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn7@2020_2/2020/08/24/14-59-30-002_ab61d096914023c1.svg"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148767},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"CI is hard!","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/101028_jacob-ci-is-hard.html","description":"<p><a href=\"http://buildbot.net/\">Buildbot</a>, the venerable Python <a href=\"http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Continuous_integration\">continuous integration</a> server, has the reputation of being complex and difficult to set&nbsp;up.</p> \n<p>After spending a couple of weeks deep in Buildbot land, I’ve come to the conclusion that this reputation, while true, is only partially deserved. That is, Buildbot is complex, but only if you’re trying to view it as an out-of-the-box <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> solution. Buildbot suddenly starts to make much more sense if you view it as a framework for creating your own <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> solution, not a <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> server in its own&nbsp;right.</p> \n<p>You won’t find this revelation anywhere in the Buildbot docs, nor in any of the books or online material that cover the tool. There are some good tutorials out there showing how to set up a simple Buildbot instance – Jeff Younker’s <a href=\"http://www.amazon.com/dp/1590599810/?tag=jacobian-20\">Foundations of Agile Python Development</a> has the best one I’ve run across – but none of these examples make much sense when setting up a complex buildfarm with complicated&nbsp;requirements.</p> \n<p>So I’m here to fill that gap. In this series of posts – I think I’m looking at five parts – I’ll explain this “Buildbot is a <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> framework” view, delve into Buildbot’s architecture, and then walk through the complicated-but-worth-the-effort <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> sever I’ve built for&nbsp;Django.</p> \n<p>By way of disclaimer I should mention I’m anything but a Buildbot expert. I’m almost certainly Doing Things Entirely Wrong. I may or may not be using public APIs as I’ve simply trolled through Buildbot’s source until I found something that did what I wanted. However, what I’ve got here on the other side makes me pretty damn happy, and I want to show it&nbsp;off.</p> \n<p>Here, then,&nbsp;is</p> \n<h2 id=\"part-1-background\">Part 1: Background<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/101028_jacob-ci-is-hard.html#part-1-background\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>We’ve been looking for a <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> solution for Django for quite some time. Over the years we’ve tried a bunch of different tools: Buildbot, <a href=\"http://cruisecontrol.sourceforge.net/\">CruiseControl</a> , <a href=\"http://hudson-ci.org/\">Hudson</a>, and even some home-grown&nbsp;solutions.</p> \n<p>Nothing’s worked out. That is, nothing’s been able to provide the “continuous” part: builds only continue working as long as there’s someone dedicated around to babysit the system. This sucks: it’s meant that at times Django’s been broken on supported platforms simply because nobody’s been bothering to run the&nbsp;tests.</p> \n<p>A few weeks ago a few of us started banging on this problem again, determined to get it right this time. Eric set up a new Hudson instance (modeled after the one he’d been using at work), and I dove headlong into Buildbot again. I’m not really going to talk much about Hudson here, but I’ll note that it’s actually been really instructive working on two different systems in parallel. It’s forced us to really think through and formalize our <span class=\"caps\">CI</span>&nbsp;needs.</p> \n<p>This led me to my first big <span class=\"caps\">CI</span>&nbsp;revelation: </p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">CI</span> <span class=\"n\">is</span> <span class=\"n\">hard</span><span class=\"p\">.</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>There’s any number of “simple” <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> tools out there… and they appear to work for exactly two projects (the project the tool was built to test, and the <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> server itself, natch). The general purpose tools – Hudson, Buildbot, CruiseControl, etc. – are big, complicated, and heavily opinionated. This is a clear sign that we’re in a space where even the basic tenets of the problem can’t be agreed upon by all parties. <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> is one of those problems that’s hard because there really isn’t a good core set of needs to be abstracted. Nearly every project has very different <span class=\"caps\">CI</span>&nbsp;needs.</p> \n<p>[This is part of what makes Buildbot so complicated: I think it’s actually trying pretty hard to be completely agnostic and allow any kind of continuous integration system you could think up. If Buildbot was more opinionated it could drop some of the layers of abstraction, but because it’s trying so hard to be everything to everyone it ends up being crazy complex. I’ve not decided if this is admirable or crazy. Both,&nbsp;perhaps.]</p> \n<p>So what are Django’s needs? What make <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> hard for&nbsp;us?</p> \n<ul> \n <li>Django’s big. The test suite is around 40,000 lines of code in something like 3,000 individual tests. We work constantly to speed up the test suite, but best case it still takes about 5 minutes to&nbsp;run.</li> \n</ul> \n<p>This means that our <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> absolutely needs to be distributed – a single test server won’t cut&nbsp;it.</p> \n<ul> \n <li>Our test suite isn’t just unit tests; in fact, it’s mostly integration tests. We run most tests against real databases and attempt to simulate as much of the <span class=\"caps\">HTTP</span> request/response cycle as we&nbsp;can.</li> \n</ul> \n<p>This means that our build system needs to be heterogeneous: since we test against real databases, we need to have lots of different ones to test against. We can’t just run a farm of Linux buildslaves running Python 2.6 and SQLite. Since slaves are heterogeneous, the build system needs to be highly targeted. We can’t treat each build slave identically, but we’ll need to target certain types of tests to the slaves that support&nbsp;‘em.</p> \n<ul> \n <li>We’re ambitious in what we support: Django supports four versions of Python (2.4, 2.5, 2.6, and 2.7), three Python implementations (CPython, Jython, and PyPy), four database engines (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, and Oracle), multiple versions of each database (for example, we support six versions of PostgreSQL: 8.0, 8.1, 8.2, 8.3, 8.4, and 9.0), and a bunch of OSes (Mac <span class=\"caps\">OS</span> X, Windows, and most Linux and <span class=\"caps\">BSD</span>&nbsp;flavors).</li> \n</ul> \n<p>We need the capability to run all sorts of crazy combinations. In an ideal world, we’d actually be able to test against every single unique python/db/os&nbsp;combination.</p> \n<p>This means that our build system needs to be capable of getting really big, potentially spanning dozens or even hundreds of machines. We’re clearly talking cloud computing here: there’s no way a bunch of volunteers can afford the money and time to keep a rack of dozens of heterogeneous hardware all running&nbsp;smoothly.</p> \n<ul> \n <li>As I mentioned, we’re all volunteers. Nobody gets paid to babysit the <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> server, which means it needs to be highly autonomous. Builds need to happen without any intervention. Most critically, build servers can’t disappear, go “stale” or break because /tmp gets&nbsp;full.</li> \n</ul> \n<p>After a bunch of playing with these requirements, I sketched out a dream system that looked something like&nbsp;this:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>We’ve got a bunch of (dormant) <span class=\"caps\">VM</span> images for a cloud computing service or&nbsp;platform.</li> \n <li>Each image “knows” which kinds of configs it can build. For example, one image might have Python 2.4 and SQLite, while another might have Python 2.7 and PostgreSQL&nbsp;9.0.</li> \n <li>When new requests are made the build master spins up some VMs, hands them build jobs (based on the types of builds the <span class=\"caps\">VM</span> can&nbsp;support).</li> \n <li>When no more builds are in the queue for a particular <span class=\"caps\">VM</span>, the build master shuts down the image and saves us&nbsp;money.</li> \n</ul> \n<p>Every out-of-the-box <span class=\"caps\">CI</span> system I examined failed to give me that workflow. Most failed on the “heterogeneous” requirement. That includes Buildbot. I knew, however, that a few projects – PyPy, Chrome, and Python itself – were using Buildbot to some success against similar issues, and I knew that Buildbot had recently gained the ability to deal with cloud computing. Finally, since Buildbot’s written in Python I was fairly confidant in my own ability to hack it to pieces if&nbsp;necessary.</p> \n<p>Well, a couple of weeks later, I’m there: I have a Buildbot-based system that’s doing exactly what I described above. I’m still not 100% sure this is the solution, but it’s a solution, and it’s&nbsp;working.</p> \n<p>The rest of this series will dive into the code. Next time, we’ll look at an overview of Buildbot’s architecture and configuration, and I’ll explain my Buildbot-is-a-framework revelation in more&nbsp;detail.</p> \n<h2 id=\"changlog\">Changlog<a \n<h2 id=\"_2\">嗯哼<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/pyqt4macos.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<ul> \n <li>这天要折腾 <span class=\"caps\">QR</span>&nbsp;码识别了</li> \n <li>运行 <code>brew install zbar</code></li> \n <li>然后,各种问题就爆发了,特别是: \n  <ul> \n   <li><code>libjpeg.8.dylib</code> 加载不到</li> \n   <li>PyQt4&nbsp;镜像丢失</li> \n   <li>…</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>重新安装
