<span class=\"err\">渐渐苏醒</span>\n<span class=\"err\">朝着光爬去</span>\n\n<span class=\"err\">爬出岩洞</span>  <span class=\"err\">眼前是无尽的岩石与黄沙</span>\n<span class=\"err\">回头远望</span>  \n<span class=\"err\">隐约感到</span> <span class=\"err\">有一丝闪光的发丝垂在天空</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<blockquote> \n <p>本文根据 Ted Chiang&nbsp;作品《巴比伦塔》改编</p> \n</blockquote>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sun, 05 Mar 2017 12:42:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"6b2897bab5510bd4a0588a5886272500","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"ZoomQuiet","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148759},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"S03E05g56/3页 难以失败的蛋炒饭教程","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170211-S03E05g56-rise-file-eeg.html","description":"<h1 id=\"s03e05g56-3a4\">S03E05g56: 3页A4纸 难以失败的蛋炒饭教程<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170211-S03E05g56-rise-file-eeg.html#s03e05g56-3a4\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<p>~ V4.3.1742 issue&nbsp;嗯哼版</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">枯藤老树昏鸦</span>\n<span class=\"err\">小桥流水人家</span>\n<span class=\"err\">古道西风瘦马</span>\n<span class=\"err\">夕阳西下</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"err\">断肠人</span> <span class=\"o\">~~~</span> <span class=\"err\">想炒饭</span><span class=\"o\">!</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>寒冷的夜,独自到家, 饥饿如影相随,可是,外卖凑不够起送价,泡面越吃越抗拒,速冻饺子越吃越寂寞… 这时,还有什么比一碗蛋炒饭更能抚慰人心的?&nbsp;哪怕冰箱仅有鸡蛋和剩饭,也能立即端出蛋炒饭来,热腾腾急吞一大碗,足以赶走成天世态炎凉. </p> \n<blockquote> \n <p>何以解忧?&nbsp;唯蛋炒饭.</p> \n</blockquote> \n<h2 id=\"_1\">那么,如何立即吃到蛋炒饭?<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170211-S03E05g56-rise-file-eeg.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>蛋炒饭的关键只是:</p> \n<blockquote> \n <p>快速&nbsp;炒香 </p> \n</blockquote> \n<p>仅仅需要:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>剩饭一碗</li> \n <li>鸡蛋一只</li> \n <li>精盐一撮&nbsp;(拇指,食指和中指轻轻捏住的量);</li> \n <li>调和油一勺(刚好薄薄铺满锅底)</li> \n</ul> \n<p>油盐饭蛋都有了后…</p> \n<p>点火: 把锅烧热,倒油并向四方倾斜锅,令油能走遍锅底. 炒蛋:&nbsp;当油开始略微冒烟时,将蛋打入,用锅铲将快速蛋黄蛋白搅散 </p> \n<p>炒饭: 等蛋液稍成糊状,把剩饭倒进锅中,迅速翻炒所有内容,闻到熟悉的焦香时, 立即加盐,&nbsp;再快速翻炒均匀入味. </p> \n<p>好了! 关火,装盘,开吃.&nbsp;当然,如果很饿的紧,端锅吃也是好的. </p> \n<p>就这样,&nbsp;不到三分钟,辘辘饥肠就服贴了.</p> \n<p>只是, 要想进一步,吃出幸福感,或是想在那个 <span class=\"caps\">TA</span> 面前演厨神时,&nbsp;就算是蛋炒饭,也必须认真起来.</p> \n<h2 id=\"_2\">更赞的蛋炒饭要怎么做?<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170211-S03E05g56-rise-file-eeg.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>其实,&nbsp;更升一层境界的蛋炒饭,关键在于:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>选择对的米作饭</li> \n <li>将鸡蛋炒香</li> \n <li>再将蛋香与饭香融为一体</li> \n</ol> \n<p>所以,得从一把米开始. </p> \n<h3 id=\"_3\">选米:取舍的心思<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170211-S03E05g56-rise-file-eeg.html#_3\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>炒饭炒饭,主角是饭.&nbsp;怎么挑选呢?</p> \n<p>严正推荐用籼(xiān)米,这种米主要产自中国南方地区,台湾地区和泰国,米粒一般较长,粘性较弱,煮成米饭更膨松, 炒起来容易粒粒分明,&nbsp;也就更快入味了.</p> \n<p>当然, 粳(jīng)米也可成,这种米主要产自北方地区,外形更圆些, 煮出饭较粘, 不过,还在可控范围之内,&nbsp;多晾干点,还是好炒的.</p> \n<p>只是,绝对不要用糯米,&nbsp;口感太黏,只适合做粽子以及其它突出糯性的点心.</p> \n<p>为了精美的蛋炒饭, 得提前一天精心煮上一锅香喷喷米饭,再把米饭摊开,晾凉,盛入密封盒放入冰箱保存一晚, 便制成了传统的:”隔夜饭”. 这样的米饭,已经失去部份水份,却又不至于太干, 炒起来颗粒分明,吃起来又弹牙又有嚼头, 口感最好.&nbsp;不过,米饭不要放置三天以上,否则米饭会太干,崩牙.</p> \n<p>米饭这样就好了,蛋炒饭的灵魂当然是蛋,&nbsp;想获得鲜美的炒蛋,首先要…</p> \n<h3 id=\"_4\">打蛋:碰撞的乐趣<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170211-S03E05g56-rise-file-eeg.html#_4\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>蛋炒饭两大主角戏份差不多,一碗饭配一枚蛋就好;如果馋的慌,就来两枚!</p> \n<p>土鸡蛋是首选,就是自然环境中散养的土鸡的蛋. 这种蛋个头较小,蛋清显的少,蛋黄颜色较深,蛋味更浓, 只是很难买到.&nbsp;超市里常见的普通鸡蛋也可以,最好逐一拿手中晃一晃,有明显的波动感的,就是散黄蛋,里面是臭的别买.</p> \n<p>炒蛋最好先打成蛋液,&nbsp;以便炒制均匀出香也快.</p> \n<p>首先将鸡蛋打进碗里,加一小撮盐, 再用筷子搅拌, 筷子稍微张开,尽可能平稳的晃动手腕,以一个方向快速搅拌,带动蛋清和蛋黄搅动,做到融为一体,没有透明块状物,&nbsp;颜色变成均匀的乳黄时停止. </p> \n<p>喜欢鸡蛋嫩点, 搅拌时稍微加一点凉白开,用量只要可乐瓶盖那么多就够;&nbsp;喜欢更松软的,延长打蛋时间,打出丰富的泡沫来就好,用打蛋器则能更快打发出泡沫. </p> \n<h3 id=\"_5\">添香:情调的来源<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170211-S03E05g56-rise-file-eeg.html#_5\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>蛋液放在一边,找到油和小葱. </p> \n<p>无论是豆油,花生油还是胡麻油,拿来炒饭都没有问题. 关注健康的话橄榄油也成,只有芝麻油太香,&nbsp;难以和蛋饭融合还是算了.</p> \n<p>小葱则一定要新鲜脆挺的,蔫了的不要犹豫,立即丢了吧.&nbsp;将小葱洗净后,细细切碎备在一边.</p> \n<p>讲究点的,可以把葱白葱绿分开来切, 碎葱白用热油煎一下,就能得到葱油,无论炒饭煮面条都是上品配料.&nbsp;而葱绿可以在起锅前撒,好为蛋炒饭增添独特香味和色调. </p> \n<p>现在万事俱备,只差开火了…</p> \n<h3 id=\"_6\">翻炒:融合的秘密<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170211-S03E05g56-rise-file-eeg.html#_6\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>首先,火力得调到最大,架锅烧热. 用手能在锅上空感到热气时倒油,同时倾斜并转动锅, 使锅底均匀铺上油,&nbsp;最好锅底多留一点油,这样,炒蛋之后还有多的炒饭更香. </p> \n<p>待油微微冒烟,只留三分之一的葱绿待用,将其它葱花全撒入锅中.&nbsp;炒一会儿,就能闻到爆葱香味. </p> \n<p>马上调成中火,一边缓缓倒入蛋液,一边用锅铲快速搅动,把不断凝结中的鸡蛋搅散,相比将鸡蛋先煎成整块再弄碎,这样更快也更香,而且能自由选择添加米饭的时机. </p> \n<p>不同风味的蛋炒饭,就取决于米饭加入的时机. 比如”金包银”,指的是米粒上均匀包裹着一层蛋液,这得在蛋液刚刚下锅,&nbsp;立即倒入米饭,快速拌匀,最后每个饭粒外都能裹上蛋,故名”金包银”.</p> \n<p>而”碎金”,是指鸡蛋散成细碎金黄蛋末混在米饭中,这要等鸡蛋基本都凝固时再和饭一起炒香.</p> \n<p>以及中间路线:&nbsp;当蛋液部分凝固时,就将米饭倒入,用锅铲反复从四周抄起,再向中央翻倒,使米饭和鸡蛋进行多种形式的融合,最后能吃到每一勺都有不同口味的混合香型蛋炒饭.</p> \n<p>当蛋炒饭独特的浓香爆发到顶点时,就是黄金时机;</p> \n<h3 id=\"_7\">出锅:享用的幸福<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170211-S03E05g56-rise-file-eeg.html#_7\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>立即关火,撒上剩余的葱花,快翻两次炒匀就能出锅了.</p> \n<p>要是再讲究点儿,将打蛋的碗用热水涮涮,倒回蛋炒饭盛干净的锅,就着留的一点儿油,&nbsp;再加把火,滴几滴酱油以及香油,即成一小碗,蛋花汤.</p> \n<p>回想整个洗手淘米, 轻柔打蛋,细细切葱,留意火候,等等饱含心意的过程,最终蛋炒饭的独特浓香如愿充满了整个房间,还没开始吃,只照着自己的灯光,&nbsp;就已经温馨了起来. </p> \n<h2 id=\"_8\">唯有美食与爱不可辜负<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/170211-S03E05g56-rise-file-eeg.html#_8\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>中华厨艺的神奇之处在于,每多花一点心思,都能多一层味道,只要勇于尝试, 无论配料,大米,油,盐和鸡蛋的组合,或翻炒手法的不同.&nbsp;蛋炒饭总能带来惊喜. </p> \n<p>嗜辣或口味重的人来讲,一定常备的各种辣酱, 拌饭酱,都可以融入蛋炒饭中来讨好自己,可以把酱料当成葱白,在炒鸡蛋前就和油爆香;想要更纯粹的口感,还可以用酱料代替盐来打蛋,&nbsp;各种咸菜也都可以这样处理,只是小心别一下放太多,要知道,放少了可以追加,多了可不一定有白饭来挽救.</p> \n<p>对素食爱好者,无论是胡萝卜,青豆,玉米还是白菜,都可以成为蛋炒饭的好搭配,蔬菜的甘甜与炒蛋的咸香中和,也更适合口味清淡的人.&nbsp;这些菜本来就可以生吃,因此不用担心火候问题;各种搭配各有不同风味,随米饭一起下锅翻炒均匀即可. </p> \n<p>无肉不欢的人,炒饭时也可以放进无法忘记的培根,火腿,甚至是红肠和腊肉,把喜欢的肉食切成玉米粒大小,以左手满满一把为限,一起炒就对了, </p> \n<p>即便没有其他配料,单靠一勺酱油也能带来完全不同的品相,即所谓:老抽上色生抽提味. </p> \n<p>亲手炒制独家密方的蛋炒饭,香气扑鼻,唇齿留香,这份满足,绝非外卖泡面所能赋予的.火候的深浅,味道的浓淡,都将得不再重要;相对于技巧,对自己倾注的心意才最珍贵. </p> \n<p>敷衍的生活,永远不能令内心满意. 对自己再好一点吧,这需要额外的爱, 一时来不及寻到那根肋骨时,怎么办?&nbsp;幸运的是,早有贤者将食物与爱融为一体,化入文字静候汲取. </p> \n<p>推荐这些书,&nbsp;同蛋炒饭细细品味,一起温柔而坚强地与自己相处. </p> \n<ul> \n <li><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>如何煮狼”:”食欲是一匹无所不在的恶狼,唯美食方能安抚.&nbsp;“</li> \n <li><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>写给牡蛎的情书”:”软体动物的爱曾是珍珠,对自己的关怀必须凝作美食.&nbsp;“</li> \n <li><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>无非求碗热汤喝”:”人生在世,吃喝二字;反求诸己,口足心满.&nbsp;“</li> \n</ul> \n<blockquote> \n <p>注: 参考 <a href=\"http://openmindclub.qiniucdn.com/res/tapes/GC4/S03E05g56/fired-rice-egg-mapping.png\">蛋炒饭-不完全烹制图谱</a>&nbsp;包含更多难以在本文中详述的可能.</p> \n</blockquote>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Sat, 11 Feb 2017 12:42:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"","linkMd5":"b12f5e1f1fd58af854bcee79fbbfc52f","bgimgJsdelivr":"","metaImg":"","author":"ZoomQuiet","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148759},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"十大早该知道的Python技巧","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/top10-Py-idioms-wish-learned-earlier.html","description":"<p>原文: <a href=\"http://prooffreaderplus.blogspot.ca/2014/11/top-10-python-idioms-i-wished-id.html\">prooffreader plus: Top 10 Python idioms I wish I’d learned&nbsp;earlier</a></p> \n<p><code>Top 10 Python idioms I wish I'd learned earlier</code></p> \n<p>I’ve been programming all my life, but never been a programmer. Most of my work was done in Visual Basic because it’s what I was most comfortable with, plus a smattering of other languages (R, C, JavaScript, etc… Pascal, Applescript, Hypertext and <span class=\"caps\">BASIC</span>, which I learned in 1979, if you go far back enough). A couple of years ago, I decided to use Python exclusively so that I could improve my coding. I ended up re-inventing many wheels — which I didn’t mind too much, because I enjoy solving puzzles. But sometimes it’s good to have a more efficient, Pythonesque approach, and time after time I found myself having “aha!” moments, realizing I’d been doing things the hard, excessively verbose way for no reason. Here is a list of ten Python idioms that would have made my life much easier if I’d thought to search for them early&nbsp;on.</p> \n<p>Missing from this list are some idioms such as list comprehensions and lambda functions, which are very Pythonesque and very efficient and very cool, but also very difficult to miss because they’re mentioned on StackOverflow every other answer! Also ternary x if y else z constructions, decorators and generators, because I don’t use them very&nbsp;often.</p> \n<p>There’s also an <a href=\"http://nbviewer.ipython.org/github/Prooffreader/Misc_ipynb/blob/master/top_10_python_idioms.ipynb\">IPython notebook nbviewer version</a> of this document if you&nbsp;prefer.</p> \n<h2 id=\"1-python-3-style-printing-in-python-2\">1. Python 3-style printing in Python 2<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/top10-Py-idioms-wish-learned-earlier.html#1-python-3-style-printing-in-python-2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>One of the things that kept me from concentrating on Python was this whole version 2 - version 3 debacle. Finally I went with Python 2 because all the libraries I wanted were not 3-compatible, and I figured if I needed to, I would laboriously adjust my code&nbsp;later. </p> \n<p>But really, the biggest differences in everyday programming are printing and division, and now I just import from future. Now that almost all the libraries I use heavily are v3-compliant, I’ll make the switch&nbsp;soon.</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"nx\">mynumber</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"mi\">5</span>\n\n<span class=\"nx\">print</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"Python 2:\"</span>\n<span class=\"nx\">print</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"The number is %d\"</span> <span class=\"p\">)</span>\n<span class=\"nx\">print</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"nx\">mynumber</span> <span class=\"c1\">// 2)</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">Python</span> <span class=\"mi\">2</span><span class=\"o\">:</span>\n<span class=\"n\">The</span> <span class=\"n\">number</span> <span class=\"n\">is</span> <span class=\"mi\">5</span>\n<span class=\"mi\">2</span> <span class=\"mi\">2</span>\n\n<span class=\"n\">Python</span> <span class=\"mi\">3</span><span class=\"o\">:</span>\n<span class=\"n\">The</span> <span class=\"n\">number</span> <span class=\"n\">is</span> <span class=\"mi\">5</span>\n<span class=\"mf\">2.5</span> <span class=\"mi\">2</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>Oh, and here’s an easter egg for C&nbsp;programmers:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">from</span> <span class=\"n\">__future__</span> <span class=\"n\">import</span> <span class=\"n\">braces</span>\n  <span class=\"n\">File</span> <span class=\"s\">\"&lt;ipython-input-3-2aebb3fc8ecf&gt;\"</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">line</span> <span class=\"mi\">1</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">from</span> <span class=\"n\">__future__</span> <span class=\"n\">import</span> <span class=\"n\">braces</span>\n<span class=\"nl\">SyntaxError:</span> <span class=\"n\">not</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span> <span class=\"n\">chance</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<h2 id=\"2-enumeratelist\">2. enumerate(list)<a class=\"headerlink\" list and its index at the same time, but I used counter variables or slices for an embarrassingly long&nbsp;time.</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">mylist</span> <span class=\"n\">model</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<h2 id=\"3-chained-comparison-operators\">3. Chained comparison operators<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/top10-Py-idioms-wish-learned-earlier.html#3-chained-comparison-operators\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>Because I was so used to statically typed languages (where this idiom would be ambiguous), it never occurred to me to put two operators in the same expression. In many languages, 4 &gt; 3 &gt; 2 would return as False, because (4 &gt; 3) would be evaluated as a boolean, and then True &gt; 2 would be evaluated as&nbsp;False.</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">mynumber</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"mi\">3</span>\n\n<span class=\"k\">if</span> <span class=\"mi\">4</span> <span class=\"o\">&gt;</span> <span class=\"n\">mynumber</span> <span class=\"o\">&gt;</span> <span class=\"mi\">2</span><span class=\"o\">:</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">print</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"s\">\"Chained comparison operators work! </span><span class=\"se\">\\n</span><span class=\"s\">\"</span> <span class=\"o\">*</span> <span class=\"mi\">3</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">Chained</span> <span class=\"n\">comparison</span> <span class=\"n\">operators</span> <span class=\"n\">work</span><span class=\"o\">!</span> \n<span class=\"n\">Chained</span> <span class=\"n\">comparison</span> <span class=\"n\">operators</span> <span class=\"n\">work</span><span class=\"o\">!</span> \n<span class=\"n\">Chained</span> <span class=\"n\">comparison</span> <span class=\"n\">operators</span> <span class=\"n\">work</span><span class=\"o\">!</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<h2 id=\"4-collectionscounter\">4. collections.Counter<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/top10-Py-idioms-wish-learned-earlier.html#4-collectionscounter\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>The collections library is, like, the best thing ever. Tuple unpacking for switching variables<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/top10-Py-idioms-wish-learned-earlier.html#8-tuple-unpacking-for-switching-variables\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>Do you know how many times I had to use a third, temporary dummy variable in <span class=\"caps\">VB</span>? c = a; a = b; b =&nbsp;c?</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">a</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"err\">'</span><span class=\"n\">Spam</span><span class=\"err\">'</span>\n<span class=\"n\">b</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"err\">'</span><span class=\"n\">Eggs</span><span class=\"err\">'</span>\n\n<span class=\"n\">print</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n\n<span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">b</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">a</span>\n\n<span class=\"n\">print</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">a</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">b</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">Spam</span> <span class=\"n\">Eggs</span>\n<span class=\"n\">Eggs</span> <span class=\"n\">Spam</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<h2 id=\"9-introspection-tools\">9. class=\"n\">subtype</span> <span class=\"n\">of</span> <span class=\"n\">T</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<h2 id=\"10-pep-8-compliant-string-chaining\">10. <span class=\"caps\">PEP</span>-8 compliant string chaining<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/top10-Py-idioms-wish-learned-earlier.html#10-pep-8-compliant-string-chaining\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008\"><span class=\"caps\">PEP8</span></a> is the style guide for Python code. Among other things, it directs that lines not be over 80 characters long and that indenting by consistent over line&nbsp;breaks.</p> \n<p>This can be accomplished with a combination of backslashes \\; parentheses () with commas , ; and addition operators +; but every one of these solutions is awkward for multiline strings. There is a multiline string signifier, the triple quote, but it does not allow consistent indenting over line&nbsp;breaks. </p> \n<p>There is a solution: parentheses without commas. I don’t know why this works, but I’m glad it&nbsp;does.</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">my_long_text</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"s\">\"We are no longer the knights who say Ni! \"</span>\n                <span class=\"s\">\"We are now the knights who say ekki-ekki-\"</span>\n                <span class=\"s\">\"ekki-p'tang-zoom-boing-z'nourrwringmm!\"</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n<span class=\"n\">print</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">my_long_text</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>We are no longer the knights who say Ni! We are now the knights who say&nbsp;ekki-ekki-ekki-p’tang-zoom-boing-z’nourrwringmm!</p> \n<h2 id=\"_1\">是也乎<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/top10-Py-idioms-wish-learned-earlier.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<h2 id=\"changelog\">Changelog<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/top10-Py-idioms-wish-learned-earlier.html#changelog\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<ul> \n <li>141130 move into Pelican as&nbsp;zoomquiet.io</li> \n</blockquote> \n<h1 id=\"dream-world\">Dream World<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/150615-99-dream-world.html#dream-world\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<p>~&nbsp;世界梦</p> \n<ul> \n <li>因为: <a href=\"http://cici19891.gitbooks.io/mybook/content/part1/note1.html\">“未来伴侣”——终身服务的性爱机器人 | mybook</a> ~ 来自 <code>开智微课.写作旗舰班</code> 魔都 <strong>腿长</strong>&nbsp;的一篇习作,引发…</li> \n <li>发自: <a href=\"http://wiki.zoomquiet.io/sifi/1999-10-05-dream-world\">Dream World | Zoom.Quiet Personal Static&nbsp;Wiki</a></li> \n</ul> \n<h2 id=\"chapter00\"><span class=\"caps\">CHAPTER00</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/150615-99-dream-world.html#chapter00\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>~&nbsp;原启</p> \n<p>…&nbsp;… </p> \n<blockquote> \n <p>寂静中,我睁开了眼. 看不到什么, 周围上下,都是混浊的白幕; “是雾吧?”,我想. 白幕飘动迷茫起来. “可是,我在哪里?不会是浮在空中吧?” 身下,现出了大地. “啊哈,那未,我希望雾的外面是大草原!” 浓雾散去,无垠的草原向四方延伸. “哦?平原之外又是什么?” 起伏的丘陵,干燥的沙漠,湿软的泽沼,奔流的大川,深广的海洋… 整个星球的所有细节随着我的想念,清晰的出现在我的思感中. 不知怎么回事,只有我想象过的事物才会思感到存在,就好象我是造物主一般&nbsp;—-古怪的感觉. </p> \n <p>想的有点累. 稍稍睡了一会,平静了一下头脑. 第二天,感受到了整个天空,和能够思及的星星; 第三天,逐步”发现”出无数的各种各样的植物; 第四天,鸟儿们占领了天空; 第五天,在海边,逐渐感觉出了鱼类; 第六天,微不足道的虫儿也进入了我的思感;&nbsp;第七天,动物们走出了森林;最后人群也出现在各地. </p> \n <p>更怪的是,我只想去不同的风景中畅游,可是后来出现的人,总是有部分跟着我,效仿我的行为,可是我并不记得当过什么首领之类的东西呀? 不过也不太在意他们就是了. 我不主动与他人讲话,他们也挺安静. 季节更替很准时,我种了些自个儿爱吃的作物,不用管什么自然的也就有了可观的收获.&nbsp;可,实际上单靠采集,就可以轻松的游历如此而不愁温饱了. </p> \n <p>只是觉得有些奇怪,好象记着些什么似的,有时作梦时,总闪过巨大难明的城市,机械等的影像. 追随的人群中也有研究机械,科学的. “所以将导入另一女性的个性,以驱动幻影的雏形,并在之后最终的幻影中提供差异变数. 提出方案的姬净璇已经提出了志愿,并通过了心理分析,基本吻合要求,就不另外特召了. ” “那未… ” … … “有没有其它意见了?” “等等,如果唤醒成功的话,将如何处理<span class=\"caps\">BJ74061</span>?” “你的意思是?” “照他的情况,已经算是正式消亡的公民了. 但我们对他这三年多以来与蜃王星进行的极海量信息交流很感兴趣—-根据我们的理论,只要是进入大脑的信息都会留下痕迹,<span class=\"caps\">BJ74061</span>的大脑应该说是现今信息接受量最大的了!!可以让他协助研究嘛?” “嗯嗯嗯—-原则上可以,但得由其本人决定,另外也只能直接入伍,派去边缘星际值勤—-哈,再没有人比他这样习惯孤独的人来长期维护无人星际站了. ” … … “<span class=\"caps\">OK</span>,开始详细制定计划,准备数据采集和训练那个三级护理士,11月17日正式开始’幻影维娜斯’计划!”&nbsp;… </p> \n</blockquote> \n<h2 id=\"chapter09\"><span class=\"caps\">CHAPTER09</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/150615-99-dream-world.html#chapter09\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>~&nbsp;幻</p> \n<blockquote> \n <p>… 三个月前我才开始注意到面禅的石壁上出现了自己的影像,开始极淡,成长般渐渐清晰,也可以说象石壁变薄一般. 虽然还是每天打坐,可是心神渐渐转移到这个影子上. 现在可以看清是名披着我长袍的小僮儿,垂目合手的安静立着. “莫不是山精?” 趁着晚霞细看这僮儿最后一眼时不禁这样想着. 半夜里,从沉思默想中惊觉,感到洞穴里多出了一个人的思绪,却并没有多一个人的气息,万般不适,出洞躺下睡了. … 再醒来时,一睁眼,对的是一双星亮的眼眸,陷入般深遂的纯净. 对视半晌后,倒是她先开口: “大哥哥,我肚子好饿哦!”—-于是全新的生活开始了. 虽然是个她,可是一点也不讨厌,吃什么都津津有味的,也不爱哭闹,只是粘着我,跟我一同静静的听,看,想;与我有共同的好奇与赞叹;而且极聪慧,在巡游中,调停部族间纠纷时,能敏锐的查觉到关键性隐情… 渐渐的,我不在专注于面壁内省,而是越来越多的对她倾述,虽然,可能不完全懂,但是她从不厌烦,总是用星亮的纯净眼眸热切的看着我倾听;而我也发觉说出来,比在心里回想要更能发现自己. … … 时光飞逝,我们游历到了大洋边近赤道的一个海角上,停留下来. 每日,我去钓鱼,她去采摘;夜晚,沐浴着星光,聊天,尽力满足她永远不枯竭的好奇心…&nbsp;我以为日子会永远这样延续下去的,也不由的这样希望着的. </p> \n</blockquote> \n<h2 id=\"chapter10\"><span class=\"caps\">CHAPTER10</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/150615-99-dream-world.html#chapter10\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>~ 新历743-12-25, pm.&nbsp;00:00</p> \n<p>新北京顶层第十二区,&nbsp;生物研究所(前”蜃景计划”新北京管理中心),姬净璇专用宿舍(原0号护理单元)</p> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>743年, 12-25 周六&nbsp;晴(他那儿);阴</p> \n<blockquote> \n <p>他醒来的时间不远了,我知道. 最近,他令蜃王星超负荷运转的时间越来越少了,但是也越来越自由了. 比如说,在我表示想知道鼹鼠的世界时,他只用了2秒钟,就从蜃王星索取到了所有现实世界中有关鼹鼠及其邻近生物圈的一切信息,甚至包括所有啮齿类动物的语言研究信息. 于是,他用拍地的方式与鼹鼠交流,请它们帮忙挖出地下深处的美味黑菌,我们则用高地的新鲜浆果完成了这奇特的交易… … 唉—-还有好多好多共处时的温柔. 他从不叫我作饭,总是独自仔细的处理各种半成品食物,一边介绍相关的知识,趣闻… 没有想到这个自闭,喜欢孤独的人,竟是个家居式的好男人?! 开始当小纳米时好辛苦,所有表情,反应都要经过过滤,去掉不合年龄及他喜好的地方,常常要重新来过. 可是后来,对他了解越多,也就越发自然的相处了. 特别是我长大了之后. 甚至于,这几周以来感觉他的世界才是我真正的生活,这也没有办法—-每天10至14个小时在他的世界梦里当纳米几个月,才回来休息一个晚上… 我也不自觉的根据他的喜好改变着自己,无论是在梦中还是现实,并不觉着强牵,也许在世界梦里就已经被改变了吧? 可是,他真的在感情方面有障碍呢. 喜欢,爱等等这样的字眼对他是禁句,会立即引起疏远的反应,虽然表面上没有变化,可是,我可以感受到他的思想,所以我知道;虽然还仅能对他强烈,明确的思想有感应. 但是,我对于他是否同样的重要? 上个月,我们实验让他看到我被人追求,而我也小心谨慎的不太热烈的表示兴趣; 可是,他竟然没有什么反应,只是感觉思想混乱了几日?我问及,他也仅仅腼腆的笑一笑,叫我自己决定. 难道,我只是他认为的一个异性的分身?永远不会离开,因为我就是他自个儿?! 可是,可是!他应该能感觉的出纳米里面不仅仅是他自己呀?!… … …&nbsp;我知道他快要醒了,因为我想这样!”</p> \n</blockquote> \n<h2 id=\"chapter11\"><span class=\"caps\">CHAPTER11</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/150615-99-dream-world.html#chapter11\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>~&nbsp;灭</p> \n<p>这几天心里颇不平静,特别是面对纳米时,总是有种惊兆闪动在心底. 纳米已是大姑娘了,比我还高的身段,匀称健美, 简单的长袍披在身上依然婀娜多姿,难怪有小伙子不顾禁令,聚集来求爱. 我感到有些骄傲—-因为纳米是我抚育大的呀. 所以,没有理由无法平静面对纳米的呀?难道是什么凶兆?&nbsp;我不敢多想. </p> \n<blockquote> \n <p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>嗳!纳米,我去抓鱼了,你多玩会儿,下午再一块儿去采弥猴桃!” “好罗嗦的大叔!嘻嘻,知道了.&nbsp;“</p> \n</blockquote> \n<p>可是,才一下水,竟然被透明的皇冠水母蜇到了后背,倾刻间全身僵硬起来,好容易挣扎上岸,后背已是全部高肿起来. 面对惊恐的奔来的纳米,尽量放轻松的说:”看来,下午,我不能陪你去了,而且,今天我们只能吃素了. ”&nbsp;纳米则,明白状况后,先将我扶到阴凉干燥处,安顿好所有后,坚决的注视我的双眼,深深的说:</p> \n<blockquote> \n <p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>那么,今天由我来为你作饭吧.&nbsp;“</p> \n</blockquote> \n<p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>轰”的一声,好象什么巨大的东西在我脑海里崩碎一般,我迷乱在以往与纳米共同生活的细碎情节中,与甩着长发轻快的走远的纳米重叠的,是星亮的双眸耵着我说:”大哥哥,我肚子好饿哦!”的小纳米;是一次意识到自己是女孩子后背着我蚊萦般述说:”大哥哥,我们还能在一起么?”的纳米… 还有对着大雪山高呼雀跃的纳米;在大象背上又兴奋又害怕得要哭的纳米… … 还有还有,不知道是水母的毒素的原故,还是我太久没有如此激动,我迷乱间,混身发烫的昏睡了过去. 等醒来时,已是晚霞蔽天的黄昏,面前摊开了一份丰富的晚餐:主食是猴面包果,主菜是烤比目鱼… 竟然连去年酿下的葡萄酒也摆到桌面上来了上来.&nbsp;我哭笑不得:”小丫头,不知道受伤的人不能吃这些会’发’的食品嘛?”</p> \n<blockquote> \n <p>可是,纳米人呢? 这才发现香蕉盆下压着一张树皮,用炭笔写着:”我去采些牡蛎来下酒,等我哟. ” 但是,现在的我是多么渴望见到她,听到她,闻到她真切的感受到她的存在哪! 不自觉的使用了思感,延伸出去,我知道,纳米能够感受到,也能够理解的. 可是 —- … —-!!! 不可能的,几分钟的时间,她不可能走出太远的! 可是… … ! 五分钟内,我仔细的搜索了整个半岛及附属大陆架,没有丝毫纳米的波动. “难道,跟我一样在海里受了伤,可是没能上岸?” 不可能!不可能的!!! 一定是她闭了五识,来吓我的,以前我教过她用来躲避猛兽的. 一准儿是的!那未,我就先吃光,气死这淘气的小丫头. 认真的,仔细的,珍爱的,小心的,慢慢的吃下这第一顿由另一个人为我作的晚饭,感觉到前所未有的满足,心里的焦急则同样的扩大,细细思感了方圆5000里的所有———没有一丝纳米存在的迹象. 一定我长时间不用思感. 而有些迟钝了. 于是我留下一堆火和醒目的留言,向四方寻去…&nbsp;… </p> \n <p>… 纳米一定在某处躲着的想法,在一个星期后荡然无存,我也踏遍了海角. “为什么?!!” “怎么没有人帮我?!!!” 我对着苍天呐喊. 四处盲目奔波…&nbsp;终于,这天,我第三次狂暴的出手,击溃了欺负老人们的少年团队,这时,追随者们已经是用害怕的眼光躲闪我了. </p> \n <p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>为什么啊?!!” “不行!我一定要找到你,无论如何!!”&nbsp;狂乱的扑入漆黑如夜空的大海,一切泯灭了下去. </p> \n</blockquote> \n<p>…&nbsp;… </p> \n<h2 id=\"chapter12\"><span class=\"caps\">CHAPTER12</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/150615-99-dream-world.html#chapter12\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>~ 新历744-07-06, pm.&nbsp;20:01</p> \n<p>西昌宇航港,远程星际航线候机厅</p> \n<blockquote> \n <p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>呼—-” 好累,假装适应这个世界. 周围人们的喧嚣,好吵;人们艳丽多彩的生活,好远… 我知道,我已经永远不能融入现实生活了,自己被抽离世界梦之后,与整个世界隔离的感觉,从没有消减过! 黑色幽默的是,我是在2月14日情人节苏醒的. 虽然冷静的接受了现实—-毕竟,在这个世界,我没有什么热望的东西,现在想想当初也不过是因为等待高考成绩太过无聊才头一次尝试”世界梦”的—-依然化了三个多月重建身心. 因为依赖蜃王星太久了,神经对自个儿的身体都不习惯了,如同突然间被强迫穿上一件根本不合身的衣物般,头两个月里我甚至于排泄失禁!自己好象被关在声音光线混乱的封闭空间里无法动弹一丝一毫,在最艰难的时候,我真的想就此走了吧… 可是,这样会令小璇伤心的,姬净璇除了身高简直就是纳米—-也本来是? 全靠她坚韧的照料,我才成功的康复回来,但,我们再也回复不了原来的关系了. 虽然,无人时,我们还常常下意识的回到梦中的称呼—-她叫我”大哥哥”,我叫她”小纳米”,但是正因为再回不到梦中,我才无以自容于纳米面前. 之后,半强迫性的对我进行了彻底详尽的分析,测试,就差拆皮扒骨了,依然表明我的脑组织,神精构造并没有因超高量的信息交流而有所改变,之所以能够令蜃王星超负荷运转,好象是玄学范畴的事了—-也就是说,在浪费大批联合国经费支出后,证实我一无用处. 最后,在我强烈的要求下,才顺水推舟的委任我只身前往冥王星自动星际补给站担当唯一的看护员,以处理必须要由人决定的突发性事故. 其实,我只是要逃离开而已—-内心世界的一切最隐密的思想和愿望被人观察研究了三年,最终证明所持的生活态度完全不可见容于现实… 我又能以什么样一种地位和心态在人群中生活? “唉… ” “咦?怎么又叹气了?马上就要出发了,喝点地球上的正宗龙井吧?!” “哦,你回来了. ” 我接过纸杯,迎上那一对星亮的双眸. … “我… ” “你… ” 同时开口,又同复于静默. “旅客们请注意,飞往火星超距宇航中转站的No.216’蓝田’号宇航飞机就要出发了,请按时检票登机. 旅客们请注意… ” “那未,我就去了,我会写信的,休假时一块儿去小行星带旅行怎么样?” 我想轻松的离别. “真的?!” “真的. “我起身. 她忽然拉住我,象梦中那般深深的坚定的注视着的我:”那么,能亲我一下吗?” 是呀,相处十多年,从来没有主动表示亲密的,可是,姑娘,你知道我下了什么决定嘛?… 暗自叹口气. 她终于闭上了,叫我一直不敢直面的星亮的眼眸. 郑重其事的亲了一下她光洁饱满的额头,我不理会她失望的眼神,转身挥挥手. 不回头的走向入口. 再见了,可爱的女孩,无奈的世界. 我创造过完美,在自己的世界中自在过,最后被这世上最有破坏力的事物伤害… … 这一切都够了. 我选择那么远,只是为了最不影响他人的情况下结束自己呀.&nbsp;再见了,这个世界梦. </p> \n</blockquote> \n<p>… </p> \n<h2 id=\"chapter-plus\"><span class=\"caps\">CHAPTER</span> <span class=\"caps\">PLUS</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/150615-99-dream-world.html#chapter-plus\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>~ Dream&nbsp;World</p> \n<ul> \n <li>[名称]”世界梦”</li> \n <li>[状态]短篇;</li> \n <li>1999/10/5～7初稿;</li> \n <li>2000/5/28-31&nbsp;一改;</li> \n <li>2000/7/1-6&nbsp;二改 </li> \n <li>2001/08/19&nbsp;自校定</li> \n <li>2002&nbsp;发表于”异度空间”—-科幻世界俱乐部内刊</li> \n <li>2003-10-24&nbsp;网络版修改</li> \n <li>2015-06-13 .md&nbsp;格式化</li> \n</ul> \n<p>[梗概]</p> \n<p>策略养成型游戏的终极—”世界梦”,暗中被当局有计划的用来统计人民对社会现状及期望的工具.</p> \n<p>由于是深层心理游戏,所以也有极少数情况中,隐性的精神病因子被激化释放,而难于醒过来,当然,都被当局正面新闻引导消弥了,可是,有例唯一的异常”病例”被隐瞒了. </p> \n<p>这是一名中国少年,在游戏中创造了一个完美的世界体系,”庄生梦蝶”般迷失在自己的世界梦中,全世界的心理学家都出动了,以各种心理刺激来唤醒少年,三年多了无进展.&nbsp;直至,一名实习护士灵机一动… </p> \n<p>背景设定:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>可能的近未来,和平安定的未来;</li> \n <li>以联合国为名,取缔国家,佊保留地区名称和文化,以地球为整体进行统一管理开发;</li> \n <li>建成近地轨道环,联接三座以”过去”,”今天”,”明日”为名的高至大气层之外的靠地球引力与离心力平衡而悬浮在3公里高空的中空管状封闭城市;</li> \n <li>各国逐渐建立庞大无比的城市岛—- 框箱式结构,由几千米高的若干支柱,吊起一个个盆地状城区;每区直径约10公里,高512米,上留有112米空气交换区,四周是建筑群,留有不少于周长40%的采光开口,中央是绿地,公园和农场;底座200米内为工厂;一般城市岛由地下一层区,地上11层区构成;整个城市岛为基本自给自足的生态系统,可以供养124,800,000人.&nbsp;—-将人民聚集到开发良好的城市中,尽量将其它地域返还大自然和原始住民,城市外仅进行必要农业和用以疗养,旅游. </li> \n</ul> \n<p>…&nbsp;… </p>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 15 Jun 2015 11:42:00 /></a></td> \n   <td align=\"center\"><img alt=\"是也乎\" src=\"http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27562-f7e665b7c4c17057?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240\" /></td> \n   <td align=\"center\"><a href=\"https://github.com/qingkongdy\">青空</a></td> \n   <td align=\"center\"><a href=\"https://github.com/gcw182nico\"><img alt=\"gcw182nico\" src=\"http://upload-images.jianshu.io/upload_images/27562-caf6e28d0c69c552?imageMogr2/auto-orient/strip%7CimageView2/2/w/1240\" /></a></td> \n  </tr> \n </tbody> \n</table> \n<h2 id=\"_1\">外来译词<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/171212-GC4L02E05chinese-imports.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<blockquote> \n <p>至少10个翻译词,比如”民主”</p> \n</blockquote> \n<ol> \n <li>电脑 ~&nbsp;computer</li> \n <li>软件 ~&nbsp;software</li> \n <li>内存 ~&nbsp;memory</li> \n <li>函数 ~&nbsp;function</li> \n <li>纤程 ~ fiber&nbsp;process</li> \n <li>黑客 ~&nbsp;hacker</li> \n <li>卡片 ~&nbsp;card</li> \n <li>热狗 ~&nbsp;hotdog</li> \n <li>蒙太奇 ~&nbsp;Montage</li> \n <li>马赛克 ~&nbsp;Mosaic</li> \n</ol> \n<h2 id=\"_2\">外来句式<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/171212-GC4L02E05chinese-imports.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<blockquote> \n <p>至少10个翻译句式,比如”不能同意更多”</p> \n</blockquote> \n<ol> \n <li>他在我的反应范围之外 \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句: the man (who gives his name to this book) was exempt from my&nbsp;reaction</li> \n   <li>句式: A be exempt from B&nbsp;免除于… </li> \n   <li>文化:&nbsp;出自”了不起的盖茨比”,表示逻辑上的否定</li> \n   <li>同例: No one can exempt from the society.&nbsp;人不能脱离社会环境之外. </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>进行不断的,有时隐蔽有时公开的斗争 \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句: carried on an uninterrupted, now hidden, now open&nbsp;fight</li> \n   <li>句式:&nbsp;对名词定语/形容的堆叠</li> \n   <li>文化:&nbsp;出自”共产党宣言”,名词前加多个形容词来修饰. </li> \n   <li>同例: Life is a never-ending,desperate struggle.&nbsp;生活是一场永不终结的无望的..奋斗. </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>菊治也不十分清楚自己为什么会与夫人陷入这种状态 \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句:&nbsp;菊田治も,自分がなぜ夫人とこんな状態に陥るのかよく分からない. </li> \n   <li>句式:&nbsp;陷入某种状态</li> \n   <li>文化: 出自”千只鹤”,状态是个科学名词,描述事物处于某时期的形态; 对应的中文会直接给出最终状态描述, 而不会对<code>陷入</code>过程加以关注; </li> \n   <li>同例: 陷入精力耗尽的状态 fall into a state of&nbsp;exhaustion</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>如此才能释放那些宝贵的劳动力,以使之能够去做别的事情 \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句: So as to free up that valuable labour so that it can go and do something&nbsp;else.</li> \n   <li>句式: so as&nbsp;to</li> \n   <li>文化: 由英语中引导目的状语而来.&nbsp;通常为先描述做了某事,而导致后面达成的目的. </li> \n   <li>同例: I got up early this morning so as to catch the early train.(我今天早起床,为了能赶上早班车.&nbsp;)</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>美国队长是美国最知名的超级漫画英雄之一 \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句: I think the Captain America is one of the most famous superhero I’ve ever&nbsp;seen.</li> \n   <li>句式: one of the most… 最…&nbsp;之一</li> \n   <li>文化: 来源于英语,表达所谓的精确. 出自”翻译乃大道(从西而不化到西而化之)”,”最高级+名词+之一”,但仔细推究,即可发现:在不圈定范围的情况下,还是没有表达出具体的精确度. 比如李白是中国最伟大的诗人之一.&nbsp;那么,最伟大的诗人到底有谁?大家是否都认同?否则,”之一”的表达,并不精准. </li> \n   <li>同例:&nbsp;“哈姆雷特”是莎士比亚最著名的悲剧作品之一. </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>是时候做点什么了 \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句: It’s time to do&nbsp;somethings.</li> \n   <li>句式: 是时候… It’s time to do&nbsp;sth.</li> \n   <li>文化: 这个句式,来源于英语中介词对中文的影响. 由于原本中文中没有介词,中文中的动词往往就能说清句子的意思. 因此面对英文中的” to do”,中文发明出:该是…&nbsp;的时候了. </li> \n   <li>同例: It’s time to have&nbsp;supper.(该吃晚饭了)</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>人们不会明白编剧有多难,除非真正从事过写剧本的工作. \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句: People will never understand how hard to write a play,unless they actually take the&nbsp;job.</li> \n   <li>句式:&nbsp;..unless..</li> \n   <li>文化: 纸上得来终觉浅,绝知此事要躬行.&nbsp;汉语中的条件都是以肯定句的语气来说的,而通过否定说除非怎样,否则就不怎样,来表明条件,应该是外来的用法. </li> \n   <li>同例: I won’t stay here unless he leaves. \n    <ul> \n     <li>除非他离开,否则我不会呆在这. </li> \n    </ul> </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>恭喜你成为我们中的一员 \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句: Congratulations to become one of&nbsp;us.</li> \n   <li>句式: become one of&nbsp;us</li> \n   <li>文化:&nbsp;汉语中,集体就是集体,没有集体中的一员这样强调个体的表述. </li> \n   <li>同例:作为我们中的一员,你应该有集体荣誉感</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>很高兴认识你. \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句: nice to meet&nbsp;you</li> \n   <li>句式: (adj) to (V)&nbsp;someone </li> \n   <li>文化: 对行为进行明确的态度描述, 而在中文, 形容词本身就可以直接用作行为, 比如:<code>幸会</code> 所以,&nbsp;这种表述形式只能是外来的</li> \n   <li>同例: sad to tell&nbsp;you</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>我不认为他是个好人 \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句: I don’t think he is a good&nbsp;man.</li> \n   <li>句式: I don’t&nbsp;think…</li> \n   <li>文化: 中文没有否定之否定的逻辑, 只会直接怼:&nbsp;丫坏蛋</li> \n   <li>同例: I don’t think it&nbsp;works.</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ol> \n<h3 id=\"_3\">存疑<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/171212-GC4L02E05chinese-imports.html#_3\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<ol> \n <li>吃个饭先 \n  <ul> \n   <li>原句: have a dinner&nbsp;first</li> \n   <li>句式: do something&nbsp;first</li> \n   <li>文化:&nbsp;原出自粤语句式,可能受外来语(英语)影响</li> \n   <li>同例: Let’s go first.&nbsp;我们走先. </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ol> \n<h2 id=\"_4\">外来比喻<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/171212-GC4L02E05chinese-imports.html#_4\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<blockquote> \n <p>至少10个比喻,比如”⼀⽯⼆鸟” </p> \n</blockquote> \n<ol> \n <li>作牛作马 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源:&nbsp;佛教六道众生可以因果转生.比喻心甘情愿被人驱使.</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>五体投地 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源:&nbsp;古印度佛教一种最恭敬的行礼仪式.比喻彻底地佩服.</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>放下屠刀,立地成佛 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源: 佛教认为,人皆有佛性,作恶之人弃恶从善,即可成佛.&nbsp;后来发展成为劝导作恶之人停止作恶. </li> \n   <li>宋·释普济”五灯会元”卷五十三:”广额正是个杀人不眨眼底汉,放下屠刀,立地成佛.&nbsp;“</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>火中取栗 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源:&nbsp;法国寓言诗人拉·封丹的寓言”猴子与猫”.比喻为别人拼尽全力,自己却落不到好处.</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>天方夜谭 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源:&nbsp;“一千零一夜”,阿拉伯古代民间故事集.比喻天马行空的奇闻异事.</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>象牙塔 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源: 原是法国十九世纪文艺批评家圣佩韦批评同时代消极浪漫主义诗人维尼的话.&nbsp;比喻脱离现实生活文艺家的小天地. </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>潘多拉之盒 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源: 出自希腊神话.&nbsp;比喻灾难和不幸的爆发. </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>阿基里斯之踵 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源: 出自希腊神话. 相传英雄阿基里斯出生后被母亲抓住脚踝浸在冥河的水中侵泡,由此可抵挡各种刀剑之伤,唯独脚踝处没有受到冥河之水的加持,因此成为他的致命弱点.&nbsp;比喻唯一的弱点. </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>罗马不是一天建成的 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源: 出自英语典故,来自”罗马神话”.&nbsp;比喻伟业不是简单达成的. </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li>太阳底下无新事 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源: 出自圣经”圣经·旧约·传道书”.&nbsp;比喻万物一切都是安排好的,并无特例和意外. </li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ol> \n<h3 id=\"_5\">弃喻<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/171212-GC4L02E05chinese-imports.html#_5\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<ol> \n <li>衔环相报 \n  <ul> \n   <li>喻源: “左传·宣公十五年”:”及辅氏之役,颗见老人结草以亢杜回,杜回踬而颠,故获之. “唐·白居易”赎鸡”诗:”莫学衔环雀,崎岖谩报恩.&nbsp;“</li> \n   <li>又: 汉 杨宝 救一黄雀,夜有黄衣童子以白玉环四枚与 宝 ,曰:”令君子孙洁白,位登三事,当如此环矣.&nbsp;“</li> \n   <li>追查:佛经大规模翻译是鸠摩罗什,东晋,佛教是在汉哀帝时传入,两汉时期佛教经典翻译的记录未见遗存记载;&nbsp;佛教大规模发展是在两晋南北朝. </li> \n   <li>所以,&nbsp;这一比喻是中文原创的</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ol>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 12 Dec 2017 12:42:00 href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/guido-letter-2-young.html#letter-to-a-young-programmer\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> \n<p>Dear (insert name&nbsp;here),</p> \n<p>I heard you enjoy a certain programming language named Python. Programming is a wonderful activity. I am a little jealous that you have access to computers at your age; when I grew up I didn’t even know what a computer was! I was an electronics hobbyist though, and my big dream was to build my own electronic calculator from discrete components. I never did do that, but I did build several digital clocks, and it was amazing to build something that complex and see it work. I hope you dream big too — programmers can make computers (and robots!) do amazing things, and this is a great time to become a programmer. Just imagine how much faster computers will be in five or ten years, and what you will be able to do with your skills&nbsp;then!</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"https://d262ilb51hltx0.cloudfront.net/max/700/1*2m0OBPBnBJu0WrobbfnBkg.png","linkMd5":"c9bf03e3277a231a7b4946dc3145cf85","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn7@2020_6/2020/08/24/14-59-17-648_3d8e1924ab0bd012.webp","destWidth":700,"destHeight":678,"sourceBytes":120780,"destBytes":40014,"author":"Zoom.Quiet","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://d262ilb51hltx0.cloudfront.net/max/700/1*2m0OBPBnBJu0WrobbfnBkg.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn7@2020_6/2020/08/24/14-59-17-648_3d8e1924ab0bd012.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148767},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"pydata笔记:环境配置","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/pydata-0-mavericks.html","description":"<h2 id=\"_1\">背景<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/pydata-0-mavericks.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p><img alt=\"s27157694.jpg(JPEG 图像,300x300 像素)\" src=\"http://img3.douban.com/lpic/s27157694.jpg\" /></p> \n<p><a href=\"http://book.douban.com/subject/25779298/\">利用Python进行数据分析</a></p> \n<p>是本好书…</p> \n<p>为什么知道这书呢? 因为翻译 <a href=\"http://weekly.pychina.org/\">|蠎周刊 |汇集全球蠎事儿&nbsp;!-)</a></p> \n<p>经常见到各种 Pandas 配合其它纯Python 模块折腾出来的大数据可视化分析作品/文章, 而且从 <a href=\"http://book.douban.com/subject/7175280/\">Python科学计算 (豆瓣)</a> 中很早 也知道了各种 Python 在数据分析方面的方便,&nbsp;所以,一直想有机会能实战性的系统折腾一下…</p> \n<p>这书当然注意到了,虽然不是 <span class=\"caps\">OBP</span> 项目组织翻译的,&nbsp;但是,好书就是好书,有点小贵,</p> \n<p>最近有了台 <span class=\"caps\">GALAXY</span> <span class=\"caps\">TAB3</span>, 所以,能上 Kindle 了,于是,发现 z.cn 上电子书有了, 响应&nbsp;@老赵的号召,立即收入!</p> \n<h2 id=\"_2\">探索<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/pydata-0-mavericks.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>正如,Python&nbsp;所有领域的自学,有一个稳定,随时有反馈的环境是最重要的…</p> \n<p>但是,作者的话,真心不能都相信哪!</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"p\">...</span><span class=\"err\">如果你恰好使用</span> <span class=\"n\">Python</span> <span class=\"mf\">3.2</span> <span class=\"err\">大部分示例是可以完整运行的</span>\n<span class=\"p\">...</span>\n<span class=\"n\">MAC</span> <span class=\"n\">OS</span> <span class=\"n\">X</span> <span class=\"err\">环境推荐安装</span> <span class=\"n\">epd_free</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mf\">7.3</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"mi\">2</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"n\">macosx</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"n\">i386</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">dmg</span>\n<span class=\"p\">...</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>于是…</p> \n<h3 id=\"pyenv\">pyenv<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/pydata-0-mavericks.html#pyenv\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>先尝试 Python 3.2&nbsp;环境:</p> \n<ul> \n <li><code>$ pyenv install 3.2</code> 成功</li> \n <li><code>$ pyenv virtualenv --distribute 3.2 32IPy</code></li> \n <li><code>$ pyenc local 32IPy2</code> </li> \n <li><code>$ pip install ipython</code>,成功</li> \n <li><code>$ pip install pandas</code>,&nbsp;失败</li> \n</ul> \n<p>然后回到书中作者的 2.7.3&nbsp;环境,重新尝试</p> \n<ul> \n <li>一样败在 <code>$ pip install pandas</code></li> \n <li>宏大的 <code>Matplotlib</code> 手工安装成功了的哪….</li> \n</ul> \n<h3 id=\"epd-free\"><span class=\"caps\">EPD</span> free<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/pydata-0-mavericks.html#epd-free\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>好吧,看来数据分析的系列模块也不是那么简单可以安装的,&nbsp;所以,</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://enthought.com/products/epd/free/\">Enthought Python Distribution&nbsp;Free</a></p> \n<p>嗯嗯嗯? </p> \n<p><img alt=\"canopy-logo\" src=\"https://enthought.com/static/img/canopy-logo.png\" /></p> \n<p>什么东西,不是说 <code>EPD free</code> 嘛?</p> \n<p>直接搜索:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>epd_free-7.3-2-macosx-i386.dmg</li> \n <li>果断还有: <a href=\"https://enthought.com/repo/free/\">Index of&nbsp;/repo/free</a></li> \n</ul> \n<p>果断下载,安装…</p> \n<p>各种不对味儿,原来自动在 <code>~/.bash_profile</code></p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre># Setting PATH for EPD_free-7.3-2\n# The orginal version is saved in .bash_profile.pysave\nPATH=\"/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/Current/bin:<span class=\"cp\">${</span><span class=\"n\">PATH</span><span class=\"cp\">}</span>\"\nexport PATH\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>而且是按照系统框架来安装到 <code>/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework</code> 的 可是, Mavericks 以后,没有默认Python 了哪,俺已经同时用 <code>brew</code> 管理系统 Python, <code>pyenv</code> 管理开发 Python&nbsp;,先不说体积:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">$</span> <span class=\"n\">du</span> <span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"n\">hs</span> <span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Library</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Frameworks</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Python</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">framework</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Versions</span>\n<span class=\"mi\">425</span><span class=\"n\">M</span>    <span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Library</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Frameworks</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Python</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">framework</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Versions</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>居然第一个案例就跑不起来!</p> \n<p><code>import pandas</code> 有报错…</p> \n<h3 id=\"canopy\">Canopy<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/pydata-0-mavericks.html#canopy\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>回到官方下载: <a href=\"https://enthought.com/store/\">Enthought&nbsp;Store</a></p> \n<p>老老实实的下载推荐的 <code>canopy-1.4.0-osx-64.dmg</code> 体积也从 74M 爆涨为 <code>235Mb</code></p> \n<p>不过,是一派标准的 <span class=\"caps\">MAC</span> 软件包了,非常流畅,也有<span class=\"caps\">GUI</span>&nbsp;的引导界面,</p> \n<p>然后 <code>~/.bash_profile</code> 追加的是:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"cp\"># Added by Canopy installer on 2014-06-03</span>\n<span class=\"cp\"># VIRTUAL_ENV_DISABLE_PROMPT can be set to '' to make bashprompt show that Canopy is active, otherwise 1</span>\n<span class=\"n\">VIRTUAL_ENV_DISABLE_PROMPT</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"mi\">1</span> <span class=\"n\">source</span> <span class=\"err\">\\</span> \n<span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Users</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">zoomq</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Library</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Enthought</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">Canopy_64bit</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">User</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">bin</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">activate</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>那就简单了,使用标准的 <code>VirtualEnv</code> 来包装的话,就不用将系统Python 环境永久性的迁移为 <code>Canopy</code> 的了,</p> \n<p>简单的 在 <code>~/.bashrc</code> 定义一个别称:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"cp\"># Added by Canopy installer on 2014-06-03</span>\n<span class=\"n\">alias</span> <span class=\"n\">canopy</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"s\">\"source \\</span>\n<span class=\"s\">/Users/zoomq/Library/Enthought/Canopy_64bit/User/bin/activate\"</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>随时调用 <code>canopy</code> 就可以进入了..</p> \n<h2 id=\"_3\">结论<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/pydata-0-mavericks.html#_3\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>最终拥有了和书中有一致反应的环境:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"140604-pydata-canopy.png\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/ZQCollection/snap/140604-pydata-canopy.png\" /></p> \n<p>参考:</p> \n<ul> \n <li> <p><a href=\"http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3819449/how-to-uninstall-python-2-7-on-a-mac-os-x-10-6-4\">osx - How to uninstall Python 2.7 on a Mac <span class=\"caps\">OS</span> X 10.6.4? - Stack&nbsp;Overflow</a></p> \n  <ul> \n   <li>sudo rm -rf&nbsp;/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7</li> \n   <li>sudo rm -rf “/Applications/Python&nbsp;2.7”</li> \n   <li>remove the symbolic links in /usr/local/bin that point to this python version see ls -l&nbsp;/usr/local/bin</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n <li> <p><a href=\"http://docs.python-guide.org/en/latest/starting/install/osx/\">Installing Python on Mac <span class=\"caps\">OS</span> X — The Hitchhiker’s Guide to&nbsp;Python</a></p> \n  <ul> \n   <li><a href=\"https://gist.github.com/goldsmith/7163055\">When I upgraded my Mac to <span class=\"caps\">OS</span> X Mavericks, a lot of utilities (like Python, virtualenv, Xcode) broke, and it was pretty stressful trying to get it all set back up. Hopefully this guide can spare you some of that pain.Note: I’m by no means a Linux or Mac&nbsp;ex</a></li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ul> \n<p>Mavericks 对 Python&nbsp;框架的调整,也的确有其原由的…</p> \n<p>当然,好书要配合好代码,</p> \n<p>及时 fork 一个自个儿可以折腾的: <a href=\"https://github.com/OpenBookProjects/pydata-book\">OpenBookProjects/pydata-book</a></p> \n<h2 id=\"changelog\">Changelog<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/pydata-0-mavericks.html#changelog\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<ul> \n <li>140603&nbsp;完成环境探索,总结</li> \n <li>140527 <a href=\"http://www.amazon.cn/gp/product/B00KD7Q7U2/ref=oh_d__o00_details_o00__i00?ie=UTF8&amp;psc=1\">“利用Python进行数据分析” Wes McKinney, 唐学韬&nbsp;(Kindle电子书)</a></li> \n</ul>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 02 Jun 2014 16:00:00 +0000","feedId":2079,"bgimg":"http://img3.douban.com/lpic/s27157694.jpg","linkMd5":"a3ed899744327edf22f8b0937c78c530","sourceBytes":0,"destBytes":0,"author":"Zoom.Quiet","articleImgCdnMap":{"http://img3.douban.com/lpic/s27157694.jpg":null,"https://enthought.com/static/img/canopy-logo.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn0@2020_1/404.jpg","http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/ZQCollection/snap/140604-pydata-canopy.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn44@2020_6/2020/08/24/14-59-28-562_b9343859f9c9061f.jpg"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598281148768},{"createdTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","updatedTime":"2020-08-24 22:59:08","title":"如何自在的折腾QPy","link":"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html","description":"<h2 id=\"_1\">背景<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_1\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>QPython 知道有两年了,是看 <a href=\"http://book.douban.com/subject/10561367/\">Head First Python(中文版) (豆瓣)</a> 时,发现竟然有 <a href=\"http://code.google.com/p/android-scripting/\"><span class=\"caps\">SL4A</span></a></p> \n<p>这种神器! id=\"_2\">目标<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_2\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>哪,俺是 Pythoneer ,不是 <span class=\"caps\">JAVA</span> 党, 更加是 <code>IDE 去死去死团</code> 的骨灰成员.</p> \n<p>很辛苦的攒銭搞到了 <a href=\"http://news.mynavi.jp/news/2013/02/07/051/index.html\"><span class=\"caps\">FILCO</span> Majestouch <span class=\"caps\">MINILA</span></a> 青轴! 绝对不要回到 <code>一指禅</code> 的时代哪!!!</p> \n<p>所以,俺要用 QPython 就是用来快速进行实用mini 应用的, 而且, 期待的开发流程, 应该完全类似现在的 web server&nbsp;开发流程:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>本地用喜爱的编辑环境进行代码撰写 (<a href=\"http://www.sublimetext.com\">Sublime Text 2</a>, <a href=\"http://leoeditor.com/\">Leo</a>,&nbsp;etc.)</li> \n <li>一键上传手机,并自动运行</li> \n <li>在手机上真实操作,同时有远程日志可以实时观察,确认问题</li> \n</ol> \n<p>以上循环</p> \n<h2 id=\"_3\">环境准入<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_3\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>对了,以下记述充斥了各种非科普性描述,&nbsp;为了误入的小伙伴不被意外恶心到,得交待一下适合继续阅读的条件:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>42 个月, Linux/Unix&nbsp;系统使用~注意!是使用不是管理体验;不然各种标准的命令行操作要死人的,,</li> \n <li>42 周的, 编程体验,不许什么語言,就是 <span class=\"caps\">JS</span>&nbsp;也成,起码要有一丝码感,,,</li> \n <li>42 次的, 蕃茄工作时间 的经历,至少知道什么是” <a href=\"http://book.douban.com/reading/12671922/\">心流</a>“般的专注!</li> \n <li>42 天的, 相关资料通读,相关社区的加入/旁听,,,一定要摸清楚相关主要开发人员的沟通习惯&nbsp;;-)</li> \n <li>42 小时, 的周边环境整备,熟悉工作系统以及配置好顺手的工具(git/apt/yum/brew&nbsp;…)</li> \n <li>42 分钟, 当前的空闲时间,能够专注以下描述,不会片面的抽取文字就来吼俺 <code>图样图森破</code> 什么的..</li> \n <li>42 秒, 明确以上条件 <code>42%</code> 吻合,即可继续&nbsp;;-)</li> \n</ol> \n<h3 id=\"_4\">硬件<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_4\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n <li><span class=\"caps\">CPU</span> 四核&nbsp;1.6GHz</li> \n <li>内存&nbsp;2G</li> \n <li>存储&nbsp;16G</li> \n</ul> \n<p>主机: <span class=\"caps\">MBP</span>&nbsp;12下半年版 </p> \n<ul> \n <li><span class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_5\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>根据策划的流程,在原作者的帮助下,进行了高强度的折腾, 经过连续 27&nbsp;小时探索,基本爽了起来:</p> \n<h3 id=\"_6\">上传<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_6\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>Android 呢,就是 Linux 哪,当然应该用 <code>scp</code> 安全上传了!</p> \n<p>目测,要依次解决:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>手机上的 <code>SSH</code> 守护在哪儿,怎么启动</li> \n <li>脚本应该上传到哪儿 QPython&nbsp;才能识别?</li> \n</ol> \n<h4 id=\"ssh\"><span class=\"caps\">SSH</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#ssh\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h4> \n<p>搜索就有:</p> \n<ul> \n <li><a href=\"http://gailly.net/android/android-tips.html\">Android&nbsp;tips</a></li> \n <li><a href=\"http://www.linuxplanet.com/linuxplanet/reviews/7301/1\">10 Android Apps for Linux Server Admins - ConnectBot, QuickSSHd, SwiFTP, AndFTP, Wyse PocketCloud - Reviews -&nbsp;LinuxPlanet</a></li> \n <li><a href=\"http://my.oschina.net/winHerson/blog/84716\">SSHDroid(<span class=\"caps\">SSH</span> Server for Android)通过<span class=\"caps\">PC</span>或命令连接android - bugeasy -&nbsp;开源中国社区</a></li> \n</ul> \n<p>经过快速的尝试, 明确 <code>SSHDroid</code> 最简洁可用,&nbsp;那就上:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140127-qpy-sshdroid.jpg\" /></p> \n<ul> \n <li>安装,配置都没有什么可说的</li> \n <li>只是,非专业版,只能用口令登录,先忍着</li> \n <li>扩展一点点儿从 <a href=\"http://onetimeblog.logdown.com/posts/2014/01/23/first-program-in-qpython\">Hello, QPython! « one-time blog</a> 来的代码,成 <code>hollo.py</code></li> \n</ul> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">import</span> <span class=\"n\">androidhelper</span>\n<span class=\"n\">droid</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"n\">androidhelper</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">Android</span><span class=\"p\">()</span>\n<span class=\"n\">droid</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">makeToast</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">u</span><span class=\"err\">'</span><span class=\"n\">Hello</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">Username</span><span class=\"o\">!</span><span class=\"err\">是也乎</span> <span class=\"p\">;</span><span class=\"o\">-</span><span class=\"p\">)</span><span class=\"err\">'</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>上传到哪儿呢?!</p> \n<p>快速翻找一下,明确几个关键路径:</p> \n<ul> \n <li> <p><code>SSHDroid</code>起始可写根:</p> </li> \n <li> <p><code>/data/data/berserker.android.apps.sshdroid/home/</code></p> </li> \n <li> <p>即: <code>cd ~</code> 回到的目录</p> </li> \n <li> <p>QPython&nbsp;环境分:</p> </li> \n <li> <p>只读执行文件起点 <code>/data/data/com.hipipal.qpyplus/files/bin/</code></p> </li> \n <li>可写资源起点以及目录意义:</li> \n</ul> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">storage</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">sdcard0</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">com</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">hipipal</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">qpyplus</span><span class=\"o\">/</span>\n    <span class=\"o\">+-</span> <span class=\"n\">cache</span>         \n    <span class=\"o\">+-</span> <span class=\"n\">lib</span>        <span class=\"err\">各</span><span class=\"n\">Python</span><span class=\"err\">版本的库安装入口</span> \n    <span class=\"o\">+-</span> <span class=\"n\">projects</span>   <span class=\"err\">俺的</span><span class=\"n\">QPy</span> <span class=\"err\">项目入口</span>\n    <span class=\"o\">+-</span> <span class=\"n\">scripts</span>    <span class=\"err\">俺的</span><span class=\"n\">QPy</span> <span class=\"err\">脚本入口</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<h4 id=\"busybox\">BusyBox<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#busybox\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h4> \n<p>等等! <span class=\"caps\">SSH</span> 上来后,各种不适应,这什么 shell 环境哪,连 <code>less</code>, <code>tail</code>, <code>vi</code> 都没有 好意思说自个儿是 <code>Linux</code> 嘛?!</p> \n<p>搜索才知道,这货叫 <code>ash</code></p> \n<ul> \n <li>躲在 <code>/system/bin/sh</code> 基本上什么也不会作</li> \n <li>所以,程序猿有 <a href=\"http://www.busybox.net/\">BusyBox</a></li> \n <li>一安装,批量将大堆习惯的工具,灌到 <code>system/xbin/</code></li> \n</ul> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140126-qpy-busybox-tail.jpg\" /></p> \n<p>这样,才能远程观察, QPython 项目目录中, 若隐若现的 <code>.run.log</code> 明显发生什么问题,&nbsp;快速增补一行:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"c\"># -*- coding: utf-8 -*-</span>\n<span class=\"kn\">import</span> <span class=\"nn\">androidhelper</span>\n<span class=\"n\">droid</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"n\">androidhelper</span><span class=\"o\">.</span><span class=\"n\">Android</span><span class=\"p\">()</span>\n<span class=\"n\">droid</span><span class=\"o\">.</span><span class=\"n\">makeToast</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"s\">u'Hello, Username!是也乎 ;-)'</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>就能运行成功,跳出最简单的发布公告框了!</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140126-qpy-hollo.jpg\" /></p> \n<h3 id=\"_7\">运行<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_7\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>好了,进入下一个阶段: <code>怎么让 QPyhon 如系统命令一样在 ash 环境中调用我们的脚本?</code></p> \n<p>目测,要依次解决:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>ash 环境变量是否兼容&nbsp;QPython?</li> \n <li>ash 环境变量如果不兼容 QPython&nbsp;怎么配置?</li> \n</ol> \n<p>将刚刚测试明确可用的脚本从 shell&nbsp;环境中调用一下:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"c\"># cd /storage/sdcard0/com.hipipal.qpyplus/projects/chaos/ </span>\n<span class=\"c\"># /data/data/com.hipipal.qpyplus/files/bin/python hollo.py</span>\n\nCould not find platform independent libraries &lt;prefix&gt;\nConsider setting <span class=\"nv\">$PYTHONHOME</span> to &lt;prefix&gt;<span class=\"o\">[</span>:&lt;exec_prefix&gt;<span class=\"o\">]</span>\nImportError: No module named site\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>果断没有那么简单,&nbsp;检查一下系统环境:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">_</span><span class=\"o\">=/</span><span class=\"n\">system</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"mi\">1</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>跟 Python 没一毛钱关系,怪不得跑不了; 吼了俩位爷,才知道: <a href=\"http://wiki.qpython.org/hacker/\">QPython Hackers</a> 果断是依赖大堆系统环境变量的, 以往能在桌面运行起来, 也是通过 <code>大JAVA</code> 的相关接口,临时声明的!</p> \n<p>那就好办了,照此办理: <a href=\"https://gist.github.com/ZoomQuiet/8642464\">gen_qpy_env.py</a></p> \n<p><code>注意:</code> 这货一定要加载到 QPython 中,用脚本形式来跑, 如果也是从后台 shell&nbsp;环境中跑,是获得不了主要关键参数的!</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140126-qpy-gen-profile.jpg\" /></p> \n<p>然后!? 肿么,让 shell&nbsp;环境每次都能自动加载上这堆配置?</p> \n<p>综合,搜索来的相关说明:</p> \n<ul> \n <li><a href=\"http://www.cnblogs.com/shyang--TechBlogs/archive/2011/10/27/2226664.html\">[转]linux虚拟内核文件系统介绍 - shy.ang -&nbsp;博客园</a></li> \n <li><a href=\"http://www.xdracco.net/mount-android-system-partition-with-readwrite-access/\">Mount Android System Partition With Read/Rrite&nbsp;Access</a></li> \n <li><a href=\"http://gailly.net/android/android-tips.html\">Android&nbsp;tips</a> </li> \n</ul> \n<p>经过尝试,明确这么来:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"c\"># mount -o remount,rw /dev/block/mtdblock3 /system</span>\n<span class=\"c\"># ln -s /storage/sdcard0/com.hipipal.qpyplus/projects/qpy_profile /etc/profile</span>\n<span class=\"c\"># mount -o remount,ro /dev/block/mtdblock3 /system</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>再关闭,重启 <code>SSHDroid</code> 后,远程登入,测试:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140126-qpy-this-zen.png\" /></p> \n<p>然后,远程人工从 shell&nbsp;调用</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"c\"># cd /storage/sdcard0/com.hipipal.qpyplus/projects/chaos/ </span>\n<span class=\"c\"># /data/data/com.hipipal.qpyplus/files/bin/python hollo.py</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>手机无论在什么桌面,都能跳出来俺的 <code>hollo.py</code> 运行结果:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140126-qpy-console-hollo.jpg\" /></p> \n<p>然后,本地,习惯性的,就可以用 <a href=\"http://tmux.sourceforge.net/\">tmux</a> 同时&nbsp;观察/管理本地以及远程的开发/测试/运行情况了:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140127-qpy-tumx.png\" /></p> \n<h4 id=\"beta\"><span class=\"caps\">BETA</span>乱入<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#beta\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h4> \n<p>作者看俺这么努力的折腾从内部机密放送俺最新开发版本,兴奋的安装上:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140127-qpy-new-version.jpg\" /></p> \n<p>然后,再运行…</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"nx\">Traceback</span> <span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"nx\">most</span> <span class=\"nx\">recent</span> <span class=\"nb\">call</span> <span class=\"nb\">last</span><span class=\"p\">):</span>\n  <span class=\"nb\">File</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"/storage/sdcard0/com.hipipal.qpyplus/projects/chaos/hollo.py\"</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"nb\">line</span> <span class=\"mi\">3</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"k\">in</span> <span class=\"o\">&lt;</span><span class=\"nx\">module</span><span class=\"o\">&gt;</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">droid</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"nx\">androidhelper.Android</span><span class=\"p\">()</span>\n  <span class=\"nb\">File</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"tubelib/sl4a.py\"</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"nb\">line</span> <span class=\"mi\">34</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"k\">in</span> <span class=\"nx\">__init__</span>\n    <span class=\"bp\">self.</span><span class=\"nx\">conn</span> <span class=\"o\">=</span> <span class=\"nx\">socket.create_connection</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"nx\">addr</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n  <span class=\"nb\">File</span> <span class=\"s2\">\"/home/river/android-sdk/workplace/python-for-android/build/python-install/lib/python2.7/socket.py\"</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"nb\">line</span> <span class=\"mi\">571</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"k\">in</span> <span class=\"nx\">create_connection</span>\n<span class=\"nx\">socket.error</span><span class=\"p\">:</span> <span class=\"err\">[</span><span class=\"nx\">Errno</span> <span class=\"mi\">111</span><span class=\"cp\">]</span> Connection refused\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p><code>/home/river/android-sdk/workplace</code> 囧rz…</p> \n<p>什么东西?!&nbsp;怎么超出来原作的本地目录了?!</p> \n<p>再问,才知道:</p> \n<ul> \n <li><code>AP_HANDSHAKE=5873cf77-e70b-4887-a8b2-28b7db3c408e</code></li> \n <li>类似 <code>AP_</code> 前缀的系列环境变量是随发行版,每次不同的,</li> \n <li>必须匹配上,否则,系统找不到,就只能使用缓存的不知哪儿的路径了…</li> \n</ul> \n<p>所以,必须:</p> \n<ul> \n <li> <p>从项目中打开脚本: <img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140127-qpy-env-proj.jpg\" /></p> </li> \n <li> <p>从 QEditor 中运行 <img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140127-qpy-env-run.jpg\" /></p> </li> \n <li> <p>在 console 中生成: <img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140127-qpy-env-gen-again.jpg\" /></p> </li> \n</ul> \n<h4 id=\"qpython\">QPython头声明<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#qpython\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h4> \n<p>参考: <a href=\"http://wiki.qpython.org/doc/program_guide/#qpython-header\">Programming&nbsp;Guide</a></p> \n<p>脚本第一行的不同声明,将由 QPython&nbsp;智能识别给予不同的运行环境,一定要理解:</p> \n<ul> \n <li><code>#qpy:console</code> , 是指运行环境为 QPython&nbsp;的命令行环境</li> \n <li><code>#qpy:2</code> 是指运行环境为 QPython 2&nbsp;的命令行环境</li> \n <li><code>#qpy:3</code> 是指运行环境为 QPython 3&nbsp;的命令行环境</li> \n <li>没有 <code>#qpy:*</code> 的是指基于 <a href=\"http://kylelk.github.io/html-examples/androidhelper.html\"><span class=\"caps\">SL4A</span></a> 的<span class=\"caps\">GUI</span>&nbsp;依赖环境</li> \n <li> <p>2014&nbsp;追加支持的</p> <h1 id=\"qpywebapp\">qpy:webapp: \n   <app title=\"\"> \n    <a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#qpywebapp\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a> \n   </app></h1> <h1 id=\"qpyfullscreen\">qpy:fullscreen<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#qpyfullscreen\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> <h1 id=\"qpylocalhost8080\">qpy://localhost:8080<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#qpylocalhost8080\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h1> <p><span class=\"dquo\">“</span>”” Launching the web service on localhost:8080 without android titlebar (fullscreen)&nbsp;“”“</p> </li> \n</ul> \n<h3 id=\"_8\">自动<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_8\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>好了,进入最后一个阶段: <code>怎么让所有的上传-&gt;配置-&gt;运行-&gt;日志收集 全部自动化一键完成?</code></p> \n<p>目测,要依次解决:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>自动上传?!(怎么通过公匙的部署,来达到无口令远程登录手机?)</li> \n <li>自动运行手机端的脚本?!</li> \n <li>自动收集日志?</li> \n</ol> \n<p>问题一,参考:</p> \n<ul> \n <li><a href=\"http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8291380/how-to-get-fabric-to-automatically-instead-of-user-interactively-interact-with/10007635#10007635\">python - How to get Fabric to automatically (instead of user-interactively) interact with shell commands? Combine with pexpect? - Stack&nbsp;Overflow</a></li> \n <li><a href=\"http://ilogue.com/jasper/blog/fexpect--dealing-with-prompts-in-fabric-with-pexpect/\">Fexpect adds answering to prompts to fabric with use of&nbsp;pexpect</a></li> \n <li><a href=\"http://www.noah.org/wiki/pexpect\">pexpect -&nbsp;Noah.org</a></li> \n</ul> \n<p>总之,对口令,没有什么好办法,大家都是通过获取反馈,匹配期待,自动输入…</p> \n<p>只是,这样折腾,很扯蛋!&nbsp;用口令登录的安全隐患怎么强调都不过份!</p> \n<p>何况,通过 <span class=\"caps\">RSA</span>/<span class=\"caps\">DSA</span> 密匙对加密,公匙部署,自动双向加密,&nbsp;安定,稳定,方便的用了多少年?!</p> \n<p>没理由在 Android 这儿栽了哪!&nbsp;果断的: </p> \n<ul> \n <li>先将本地公匙用口令登录的方式推上手机</li> \n <li>然后,<a href=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/apk/berserker.android.apps.sshdroid-cracked-signed.apk\">sshdroid-cracked.apk</a></li> \n <li>然后,就没有然后了&nbsp;;-)</li> \n</ul> \n<p>只是,唯一的问题: - 因为 <span class=\"caps\">SSH</span> 服务端切换了, 导致 <span class=\"caps\">SSH</span> 认证冲突,要清除对应的配置行 - 每次都要全部清除,或是人工清除? - 不用这么 Naive ,参考:<a href=\"http://floss.qiniudn.com/data/20130327153058/index.html\"><span class=\"caps\">SSH</span> Warning: the <span class=\"caps\">RSA</span> host key for differs from the key for the <span class=\"caps\">IP</span> address -&nbsp;zhangp专栏</a></p> \n<p>一行解决:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"nv\">$ </span>sed -i -e <span class=\"s1\">'36d'</span> ~/.ssh/known_hosts\n</pre> \n</div> \n<h4 id=\"fabric\"><a href=\"http://docs.fabfile.org/en/1.5/index.html#usage-documentation\">Fabric</a><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#fabric\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h4> \n<p>非 <code>C/S</code> 结构的脚本化自动部署工具!</p> \n<p>嘦在本地安装好<a href=\"http://docs.fabfile.org/en/1.5/index.html#usage-documentation\">Fabric</a> 再在本地工程目录中放一个 <code>fabfile.py</code>,&nbsp;就可以:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"err\">$</span> <span class=\"n\">fab</span> <span class=\"o\">?</span>\n\n<span class=\"nl\">Warning:</span> <span class=\"n\">Command</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">s</span><span class=\"p\">)</span> <span class=\"n\">not</span> <span class=\"n\">found</span><span class=\"o\">:</span>\n    <span class=\"o\">?</span>\n\n<span class=\"n\">Available</span> <span class=\"n\">commands</span><span class=\"o\">:</span>\n\n    <span class=\"n\">env</span>         <span class=\"n\">print</span> <span class=\"n\">Android</span> <span class=\"n\">sys</span><span class=\"p\">.</span> <span class=\"n\">env</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">genenv</span>      <span class=\"n\">gen</span> <span class=\"n\">qpy</span> <span class=\"n\">need</span> <span class=\"n\">env</span> <span class=\"n\">into</span><span class=\"o\">:</span> <span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">storage</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">sdcard0</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">com</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">hipipal</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">qpyplus</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">projects</span><span class=\"o\">/</span><span class=\"n\">qpy_profile</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">pushproj</span>    <span class=\"n\">scp</span> <span class=\"n\">all</span> <span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">py</span> <span class=\"n\">into</span> <span class=\"n\">Android</span> <span class=\"n\">QPython</span> <span class=\"n\">projects</span> <span class=\"n\">dir</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">qpy</span>         <span class=\"n\">main</span> <span class=\"n\">develop</span> <span class=\"n\">tools</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"k\">auto</span> <span class=\"n\">upload</span> <span class=\"n\">and</span> <span class=\"n\">running</span> <span class=\"n\">in</span> <span class=\"n\">Android</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">qpy_run_it</span>  <span class=\"n\">fab</span> <span class=\"n\">qpy_run_it</span><span class=\"o\">:</span><span class=\"n\">script</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">MY</span><span class=\"p\">.</span><span class=\"n\">py</span>\n    <span class=\"n\">uname</span>       <span class=\"n\">print</span> <span class=\"n\">Android</span> <span class=\"n\">sys</span><span class=\"p\">.</span> <span class=\"n\">info</span><span class=\"p\">.</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>日常,无论折腾多少个项目,都可以统一部署此脚本到目录中, <a href=\"https://gist.github.com/ZoomQuiet/8645207\">Fabric for QPython auto upload/running script/collect log etc… from local through <span class=\"caps\">SSH</span></a></p> \n<p>只要定制一两只参数,&nbsp;平时的开发流程就变成了:</p> \n<ol> \n <li>本地用喜爱的编辑环境进行代码撰写 (<a href=\"http://www.sublimetext.com\">Sublime Text 2</a>, <a href=\"http://leoeditor.com/\">Leo</a>,&nbsp;etc.)</li> \n <li><code>fab qpy:script=当前调试的主脚本.py</code> 一键上传手机,并自动运行</li> \n <li>在手机上真实操作,明确效果</li> \n</ol> \n<h4 id=\"_9\">日志<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_9\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h4> \n<p>目测同最初设想的理想开发流程相比:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre>1. 本地用喜爱的编辑环境进行代码撰写\n2. 一键上传手机,并自动运行\n3. 在手机上真实操作,同时有远程日志可以实时观察,确认问题\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>只差一个运行日志的实时观察了哪,,,</p> \n<p>本来想着很简洁的:</p> \n<ul> \n <li><a href=\"http://tmux.sourceforge.net/\">tmux</a>&nbsp;再多开个窗口</li> \n <li><code>tail -f /PATH/2/MY/QPY/PROJECT/.run.log</code> 就完事儿的哪!</li> \n</ul> \n<p>结果,不得不提交个&nbsp;Issue:</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://github.com/qpython-android/QPython.org/issues/2\">.run.log is odd · Issue #2 ·&nbsp;qpython-android/QPython.org</a></p> \n<h2 id=\"_10\">结论<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_10\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>虽然, 最后集中成了一份儿 <a href=\"https://gist.github.com/ZoomQuiet/8645207\">fabfile.py</a> 脚本,但是涉及的工具还是很多的, 所以,&nbsp;整体上,最终可用的组合关系是:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"k\">[[Android in mobile]]</span>\n    <span class=\"err\">+-</span> <span class=\"err\">/etc/profile</span> <span class=\"err\">-&gt;</span> <span class=\"err\">ln</span> <span class=\"err\">-s</span>\n    <span class=\"err\">|</span>                  <span class=\"err\">V</span>\n    <span class=\"err\">|</span>                  <span class=\"err\">V</span>\n    <span class=\"err\">|</span>    <span         <span class=\"err\">^</span>\n    <span class=\"err\">+-</span> <span class=\"err\">QPython</span> <span class=\"err\">-&gt;</span> <span class=\"err\">gen_qpy_env.py</span>\n    <span <span class=\"err\">wifi</span> <span class=\"err\">net</span> <span class=\"err\">domain</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<h3 id=\"todo\"><span class=\"caps\">TODO</span><a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#todo\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>然后, 有个比较顺心的 QPython 折腾环境了,&nbsp;就可以进一步的折腾各种想玩/能玩能玩的了!</p> \n<h3 id=\"pip\">pip<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#restful-onering\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h3> \n<p>不知道大家记得 <a href=\"http://code.google.com/p/onering-desktop/wiki/OneRing\">OneRing</a>&nbsp;卟?!</p> \n<p>豆瓣首席架构师/布道官/<span class=\"caps\">CTO</span> 洪教授&nbsp;亲手玩的项目:</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre>跨平台的桌面应用开发库,\n使用HTML5+CSS3制作用户界面,\n用Javascript编写交互逻辑,\n同时提供用写web后端的技术编写后台逻辑!\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>但素,现在有了 QPython 完全可以0成本山寨一个移动版的 MyRing&nbsp;了哪:</p> \n<p>呼应各种本地的 <a href=\"http://floss.qiniudn.com/data/20110818160723/index.html\">RESTful</a> 请求,总是要有一个内置的web&nbsp;服务的,</p> \n<p>当然上 <a href=\"http://bottlepy.org/\">Bottle</a>&nbsp;了,只有一个文件的越级微框架,不用安装,随项目目录发布就好.</p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"c\">#qpy:console</span>\n<span class=\"kn\">from</span> <span class=\"nn\">bottle</span> <span class=\"kn\">import</span> <span class=\"n\">route</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">run</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">template</span>\n\n<span class=\"nd\">@route</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"s\">'/hello/&lt;name&gt;'</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n<span class=\"k\">def</span> <span class=\"nf\">index</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">name</span><span class=\"p\">):</span>\n    <span class=\"k\">return</span> <span class=\"n\">template</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"s\">'&lt;b&gt;Hello {{name}}&lt;/b&gt;!'</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">name</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"n\">name</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n\n<span class=\"n\">run</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">host</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"s\">'localhost'</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> <span class=\"n\">port</span><span class=\"o\">=</span><span class=\"mi\">8080</span><span class=\"p\">)</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>因为是要守护在后台长期运行的,所以用 <code>#qpy:console</code> 标定</p> \n<p>可惜:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140126-qpy-bottle-error.jpg\" /></p> \n<p>原来:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140126-qpy-install-wsgi.jpg\" /></p> \n<p>然后:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140126-qpy-bottle-running.jpg\" /></p> \n<p>没有然后:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"snap4qpy\" src=\"http://zoomq.qiniudn.com/CPyUG/QPython/snap/140126-qpy-bottle-hello.jpg\" /></p> \n<p>哈哈!&nbsp;一切如愿!</p> \n<h2 id=\"_11\">专题体例:<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_11\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>QPy 的大妈们曰了:&nbsp;每个专题应该包括 </p> \n<div class=\"highlight\"> \n <pre><span class=\"n\">Introduction</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> \n<span class=\"n\">getting</span> <span class=\"n\">start</span><span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">include</span> <span class=\"n\">sample</span> <span class=\"n\">better</span><span class=\"p\">),</span> \n<span class=\"n\">packages</span><span class=\"p\">,</span> \n<span class=\"n\">videos</span> <span class=\"p\">(</span><span class=\"n\">searched</span> <span class=\"n\">result</span> <span class=\"n\">from</span> <span class=\"n\">youtube</span> <span class=\"n\">or</span> <span class=\"n\">directly</span> <span class=\"n\">video</span> <span class=\"n\">link</span> <span class=\"p\">)</span>\n</pre> \n</div> \n<p>好吧,慢慢来,,,下次专注 Bottle 结合 QPython&nbsp;实现可用随身小工具.</p> \n<h2 id=\"_12\">时间帐单:<a class=\"headerlink\" href=\"https://blog.zoomquiet.io/init-my-qpy-env.html#_12\" title=\"Permanent link\">¶</a></h2> \n<p>简单回顾一下整个从完全小白到折腾出当前扫盲文章的时间投入:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>1H:&nbsp;动心,所有相关资料收集,概览</li> \n <li>2H: <span class=\"caps\">SSH</span> 登录成功,&nbsp;不用口令,未果</li> \n <li>2H: env&nbsp;确认问题,解决问题</li> \n <li>1H: BusyBox 熟悉手机上的shell&nbsp;环境</li> \n <li>8H: Fabric 打通, 还是env 问题,以及版本变化后要重新生成 env&nbsp;配置</li> \n <li>4H:&nbsp;整理为文章</li> \n</ul> \n<p><code>18H</code> 总计可统计的大块时间, 其它基本有几乎相同的沟通时间,用在 通过 微信/邮件/github&nbsp;等等方式沟通</p> \n<h2 id=\"changelog\">Changelog<a
